loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy rice, maize, and millet flour for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy potatoes.

loans.name: Nicacia

texts.es: La señora Nicacia trabaja en limpieza de casas y también tiene una pequeña tienda donde vende carne y otros productos de consumo diario; su esposo es electricista. El crédito lo requiere para su aumento de capital, pues necesita comprar una heladera para mantener la carne en buen estado y comprar en mayor cantidad; también necesita comprar otros productos para mantener su tienda con un buen stock de mercadería y así hacer crecer su negocio. Vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de Valle Hermoso  en la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene un  hijo. Es la quinta vez que  IMPRO aprueba un préstamo para Nicacia y la segunda vez que se canaliza a través de KIVA.
texts.en:
Nicacia works cleaning houses and also has a small store where she sells meat and other daily use items; her husband’s an electrician.  She needs the loan to increase working capital because she needs to buy a refrigerator to keep her meat in good condition and to be able to buy in larger amounts.  She also needs to buy other merchandise to keep her store well stocked and thus help it grow.  

She lives in her parents’ house in the city of La Paz’s Valle Hermoso zone.  She’s married and has a son.  This is the fifth time IMPRO has approved a loan for Nicacia and the second time it’s been channeled through KIVA.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia de 46 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicado en el distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace buen tiempo Julia se dedica a preparar y vender comida en su domicilio, actividad que realiza desde  hace varios años desde el jueves hasta el domingo, donde  hay más afluencia de clientes, pero a pensado en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para implementar comprando utensilios, mesas y sillas para seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Julia con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno se propone una meta se puede hacer realidad, con la finalidad de que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Julia, 46, lives with her husband and children in their own house that is equipped with basic utilities.  It is located in the Tambogrande district in Piura department.  This is an area with much agriculture, cattle raising, and handicrafts.

Julia has been preparing and selling food in her home for quite a while from Thursdays to Sundays when there are many customers.  She is planning on requesting a loan from Edypme Alternative of 1500 new soles to start buying utensils, tables and chairs to continue offering good service to her customers.  She will use the earnings that she receives to cover the financing and improve the quality of life of her family.

She has been developed confidence and the respect of her neighbors with her work and her desire to get ahead.  She shows that when one has a goal, it can be achieved,  and the end will be that her children have a better future.

loans.use: to buy utensils, tables, and chairs to outfit her business

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a 26-year-old hardworking man living in a family house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to build rental houses since they are on high demand. He sells used shoes that he takes to all surrounding markets, and has been in this business for six years. He has challenges of high transportation costs, and he desires to buy his own transportation means. Francis needs this loan facility to buy used shoes for resale.

loans.use: To buy used shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and finery

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is 22-years-old, and single.  He operates a motorbike transportation business to earn a living.  He has been in this business for three years.  He joined a group in Faulu, Kenya in order to have access to financial resources.  He has requested a loan for 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy spare parts to repair his motorbike.

Samson hopes that someday he will own a van for transportation business.

loans.use: To buy spare parts to repair his motorbike.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more high grade manure to use on her banana farm.

loans.name: Santos Antonio

texts.es: Santos Antonio tiene 36 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de ganado. hace mas 12 años que tiene esta actividad, inicio desde muy joven con  esfuerzo propio ya que lo aprendio por sus padres. tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo, el siempre esta buscando la manera de proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. el financiamiento es para la compra de toros, vacas, chivos entre otros. el desea ampliar cada dia su negocio.
texts.en: Santos Antonio is 36 years old and has been buying and selling livestock for a living for more than 12 years.   He started this business on his own when he was very young since he learned it from his parents.  He has a dependent child.  He is always looking for ways to provide for his family financially.  He will use the loan to buy livestock such as bulls, cows, and goats.  He wants to expand his business everyday.

loans.use: buy bulls, cows, and goats.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina de 31 años de edad, es soltera, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Castilla que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Alejandrina desde hace 5 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de moños de soga para decorar muebles, las cuales lo tejen para poderla utilizarlo y forrar muebles, es conocida en la zona donde vive por que la actividad que realiza no es muy común, tiene su clientela y con los ingresos  que obtiene puede solventar sus necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado  un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más material (soga) para seguir elaborando sus moños (trenzado de la soga) y también para realizar algunos arreglos en el interior de su casa.  Alejandrina es unamujer trabajadora, activa y alegre que por sus propios medios trata de salir adelante y superarse en la vida.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 31 years old, single, and owns her own home which has running water and electricity.  Her home is located in the Castilla district which is part of the department of Piura.  This area is known for: agriculture, livestock, and arts.

For the past 5 years Alejandrina has been making and selling rope strands to decorate furniture which is used to weave covers for furniture.  She is known in her area for what she does because it is not that common; she has customers and with her earnings she can cover her personal expenses.  

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative for 1500 nuevos soles ($550) in order to purchase more rope and continue makings strands and also do some home improvements.  Alejandrina is a hard-working woman who is active and happy and tries to get ahead and succeed in life through her own means.

loans.use: to purchase material for threading rope.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy traditional cloth and damask fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El señor Sergio se dedica a la producción de leche que es vendida a la Planta Industrializadora de productos lácteos PIL y su esposa e hijos lo ayudan con el cultivo de papa y otros productos. Con los ingresos que obtienen se mantienen. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una vaca lechera, para de esta forma aumentar su producción de leche y mejorar sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Laja del departamento de La Paz; es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Sergio es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2009.
texts.en:
Sergio is dedicated to milk production that’s sold to the PIL Dairy Products Industrializing Plant.  His wife and children help him to farm potatoes and other products.  They support themselves with the income they earn.  He needs the loan to buy a dairy cow to increase milk production and thus his income.  

He lives in his own house located in the community of Laja in La Paz Department.  He’s married and has four children.  Sergio has been an IMPRO client since 2009.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk, cream, cuajada, and cheese

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson, 41, is married with three children, who are in school. For 15 years, he has been operating a retail shop. He was previously employed before he went into the business. He has managed to improve his business with his previous loans from Faulu Kenya.
 
Wilson hopes to open a supermarket in the future. He has requested a loan of 50,000 KES to buy soda, maize flour, cooking fat and salt.

loans.use: to buy soda, maize flour, cooking fat and salt.

loans.name: Souleymane

texts.fr:
Né il y’a 45 ans à Doumanani préfecture de Sikasso, Souleymane est  un polygame qui a 2 femmes et 11 enfants. Il résidant avec sa famille à Hamdallaye, un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Monsieur  Souleymane après avoir mené plusieurs activités sans succès,  s’est finalement initié il y a environ deux années à l’achat vente du bois de chauffe qu’il achète auprès des paysans de Denderso et environnants. Il est beaucoup sollicité de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, il décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec qui, il est à son premier prêt individuel.
Avec ce premier prêt, il compte acheter, 2 chargements de camion “10 tonnes” en bois de chauffe. Il revend en détail et au comptant à une clientèle diverse er variée.
 Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 100 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé essentiellement pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Born 45 years ago in Doumanani, Sikasso Prefecture, Souleymane is a polygamous man who has two wives and eleven children. He and his family are residents of Hamdallaye, a working-class district of Sikasso City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). After having run several businesses without success, he finally was introduced, about two years ago, to the buying and selling firewood, which he buys from peasant farmers in and around Denderso. He is much in demand by his customers for the quality of his products. 

To satisfy his burgeoning customer base, he decided to join the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso and is now on his first individual loan with this institution. With this initial loan, he intends to buy two 10-tonne truckloads of firewood. His retail sales are in cash to a diverse and varied customer base. 

With this loan, Souleymane envisions making a monthly profit of 100,000 francs CFA that will be used essentially for covering family expenses and the loan interest. The rest will be invested in his business.

loans.use: to buy firewood

loans.name: Rapheal

texts.en:
Raphael, 70, is married with 27 children aged between 11 to 49 years and lives in his own permanent house in Hioma, Uganda. For 20 years, he has been selling clothes and from this business, he has been able to educate his children. The last born is now in Senior and he has five wives.

Raphael started with 500,000 but now has capital of 7,000,000 Uganda shillings. He faces the challenge of high costs for cloth materials and his dream is to import directly from the Democratic Republic of Congo. Raphael needs a loan to buy traditional cloth material for resale.

loans.use: to buy  traditional cloth material for resale.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina es una madre de familia de 45 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 4 años Catalina se dedica a la preparación y venta de chifles (plátano frito) y camotes fritos, los cuales embolsa y luego vende en el paradero donde están los carros que van de Olmos a Chiclayo, su clientela a aumentado y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado  un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para compra de insumos (plátano verde y camote) para seguir preparando estos ricos alimentos y poder venderlos, con las ganacias podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Catalina es una mujer trabajadora y alegre que con gusto hace todo lo que está en sus manos para sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Catalina is a 45 year old wife and mother. She lives with her children in her own home which only has electricity. It is located in the district of Olmos, which belongs to the department of Lambayeque. This zone is characterized by its farming and cattle activity.  

For 4 years, Catalina has worked preparing and selling chifles (fried plantains) and fried sweet potatoes.  She bags them and then sells them at a bus stop for the buses that go from Olmos to Chiclayo. Her clientele has grown and with the income she makes she will be able to cover her family's basic needs.  

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy ingredients (green plantains and sweet potatoes) to continue preparing these delicious foods and be able to sell them. With the earnings, she will be able to pay off her loan and improve her quality of life. Catalina is a hardworking and cheerful woman who happily does everything she can to get her family ahead.

loans.use: to buy ingredients (plantains and sweet potatoes) to keep preparing these foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Nerea

texts.en:
Nerea is a member of Sunshine group in Faulu Kenya. She has been tailoring for 14 years to earn a living. Being a widowed lady, she works hard in her business so as to provide for her three children, who are in school. She employs one person in her business.

Nerea has benefited from Faulu Kenya because she has managed to pay school fees for her children. Through Faulu Kenya, she has also learned how to save money. She has requested a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy fabric.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Roseline

texts.en:
Roseline, 26, is married with three children who go to school. For three years, she has been selling second-hand clothes to earn a living. She also makes tablecloths to generate more income. Through Faulu Kenya, she has learned how to manage her finances. This has helped her to invest in her business.

Roseline hopes to open other business premises in the future. She has requested a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Cruz Mariana

texts.es:
Cruz de 36 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijo en edad escolar en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde algunos años Cruz se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra al por mayor y menor (material recliclable), actividad que actualmente se a incrementado por su rentabilidad, durante todo el día trata de recolectar lo necesario para clasificarlo y luego venderlo, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá cubrir sus obligaciones familiares.

Para poder seguir realizando la misma actividad ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para seguir comprando chatarra y realizar algunos arreglos en casa.  Cruz es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que desea es que su familia se supere y salga adelante, en especial su hijo.
texts.en:
Cruz is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and school aged son in her own house. It only has electricity and is located in the district of Olmos, which belongs to the department of Lambayeque. This area is characterized by its farming and cattle activity.  

For some years Cruz has bought and sold scrap metal (recyclable material)  wholesale and retail. She has increased the activity now due to its profitability. All day long, she tries to collect what she needs to classify it and then sell it. With the income she earns, she will be able to cover her family's obligations.  

In order to keep doing the same activity, she has asked for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. With it, she will be able to continue buying scrap metal and make some repairs on her house. Cruz is a responsible and hardworking person and the only thing she wants is for his family to get ahead, especially her son.

loans.use: to buy more scrap metal for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice and groundnuts for resale.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a 36-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She has three children living in a semi-permanent house and her dream is to construct a permanent house for residence. She has a market stall where she sells fresh foods and has been running this business for 8 years. Her major hardship is failure of debtors to pay back on time and her dream is to switch to selling cereals since they are more profitable and do not get spoiled quickly. Grace needs the loan to buy beans, tomatoes, and sweet potatoes for sale.

loans.use: To buy more beans, tomatoes, and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Damaris Carolina

texts.es: Damaris Carolina tiene 28 años, su actividad es una miscelánea. En donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a comprar lo que ofrece. Hace más de 12 años que tiene este medio de vida, Damaris tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo ella tiene la responsabilidad de proporcionarle alimentos, vestimenta y estudios. Ella se levanta temprano para empezar su labor todos los días. El crédito es para la compra de sandalias, zapatos deportivos,  zapatillas entre otros.
texts.en:
Damaris Carolina is 28 years old.  She has a miscellany shop where she stocks a wide variety of products.  Most of her customers come by to buy what she has in stock.  She’s had this way of earning a livelihood for the last 12 years.

Damaris has two minor children in her care; it’s her responsibility to provide them with food, clothing and schooling.  She rises early to start working every day.  The loan is to buy sandals, sports shoes and slippers, among others.

loans.use: to buy sandals, sports shoes and slippers, among others.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en: Alex, 31, is a married man with four children living in a permanent house with his family in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to buy a big piece of land and start up a ranch. He operates a boutique which mainly sells suits. He has been in business for four years. His major challenge is the high rate of inflation which affects demand. His dream is to set up a fashion house. Alex needs the loan to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Edda Del Socorro

texts.es: Edda Del Socorro tiene su negocio que es la venta de articulos escolares, hace mas de 14 años que tiene este negocio. ella es una mujer emprendedora y resposnble que quiere salir adelante con su familia. su negocio esta ubicado contiguo al centro de salud. el credito que solicita es para la compra de cuadernos, cartulinas, lapiceros, borradores, reglas y hojas. desea que su negocio crezca para seguir proporcionando a su familia el alimento diario.
texts.en: Edda Del Socorro sells school supplies.  She’s been in business over 14 years.  She is an enterprising, responsible woman who wants to get ahead with her family.  Her business is located next door to the health center.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy notebooks, construction paper, mechanical pencils, erasers, rulers and sheets of paper.  She wants her business to grow to continue providing her family with their daily food.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, construction paper, mechanical pencils, erasers, rulers and sheets of paper.

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en: Bosco, 26, is a married man blessed with one child living in a semi-permanent house in Kamwenge, Uganda. His main dream is to buy more milling machines and place them in different areas of his region. He mills cassava flour and has been in this business for three years. A major challenge he faces is the constant breakdown of the machines, which makes him inefficient. Bosco needs the loan to help him to buy a milling machine.

loans.use: to buy a milling machine.

loans.name: Acela

texts.es:
Acela es una madre de familia de 44 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia,  cuenta con servicios sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de La Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Acela se dedica a la elaboración, venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú) y crianza de aves de corral, estas actividades los realiza desde hace 2 años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  También comercializa aves de corral, lo que le permite ayudarse con otro ingreso.

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Acela a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora, utensilios y alimento balanceado para sus aves, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Acela is a 44 year old wife and mother. She lives with her husband and children in her own house, which only has electricity. It is located in the district of La Matanza, which belongs to the departament of Piura.  Throughout this area, people work in farming, cattle and artisanal crafts.

Acela works making and selling chicha de jora (a delicious drink made from corn and very popular in northern Peru). She also raises poultry. She has done these activities for 2 years. It is a tradition that has been passed from generation to generation. Lately her sales of chicha de jora have increased, which has helped her increase her income and improve her family's quality of life.  She also sells her poultry, which helps her with another income.

With an opportunity to grow, Acela has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles  to buy a large quantity of corn meal to make chicha de jora, as well as utensils and balanced feed for her birds. Her goal is to obtain more earnings and increase her clientele to pay off the loa and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more corn meal to make chicha de jora, as well as utensils and feed for her birds.

loans.name: Wilfrido

texts.es: Wilfrido, tiene la edad 45 de  años, está casado y vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el cultivo ya establecido y lo que quiere es darle una buena asistencia para obtener mejores cosechas este año. El lo que hará específicamente es comprar abono y materiales necesarios para mejorar la calidad del cultivo. El pretende con este crédito realizar las ganancias necesarias para seguir adelante con el proyecto y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida para el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Wilfrido is 45 years old, married and lives with his 4 children and his wife who are his main priority.  With the loan he intends to buy supplies to care for his coffee plantation. His coffee crop is already established and what he wants to do is to provide good care so that he will obtain a better yield this year. What he will do specifically is to buy fertilizer and other necessary materials to improve the quality of his coffee beans. He hopes with this loan to earn the income needed to get ahead and provide his family with a better quality of life in the future.  This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has had no other prior loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has more easily extended credit and at a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to care for his coffee beans.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana de 56 años, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona de actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Juana cuenta con su negocio de comida de forma ambulatoria, su puesto de comida esta en una zona muy concurrida por lo pobladores, actividad que realiza desde hace algunos años, cuenta con su propia clientela, es conocida por la limpieza y la buena sazón que tiene, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y utensilios para su negocio y seguir brindando un buen servicio a sus clientes, con sus ganancias cubrir sus gastos familiares.  Juana con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza de sus clientes, con la finalidad de que más adelante tenga un negocio grande donde pueda ofrecer todo tipo de comida.
texts.en:
Juana is 56, and lives with her family in her own house, which only has electricity.  It is located in the rural area of Cayalti district in Chiclayo province.  This is an area of farming and livestock-raising.  

Juana has a business selling food in the street. Her food stall is in an area much frequented by local people. She has been doing this for a few years and has her own clientele.  Her stall is known for its cleanliness and the good flavor of the food.  With the income she receives, she will be able to have a better quality of life.

She has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos pesos to buy ingredients and utensils for her business.  This will enable her to continue offering good service to her customers, and cover her household expenses with her earnings. With her hard work and her desire to get ahead in life, she has won the trust of her customers. Her aim is to someday have a large business where she can offer all types of food.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and utensils to continue preparing food.

loans.name: Nolberto

texts.es:
Nolberto de 39 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Nolberto desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo los ofrece en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtiene buenas ganancias para solventar los gastos diarios de su hogar.  También cuenta con sus tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y una vez que cosecha lo comercializa a un buen precio en los diferentes mercados.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para compra de alimento balanceado y de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con los ingresos que obtenega puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Nolberto es un hombre trabajador y responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus hijos se superen y mejorar económicamente para brindarles estudios superiores como es su meta.
texts.en:
Nolberto is 39 years old. He lives with his wife and children in his own house. It does not have basic services. It's located in the rural part of the district of   Tambogrande, which belongs to the department of Piura. This area is characterized by by its farming, cattle and artisanal activity. 

For several years, Nolberto has raised and sold sheep. His pen is in the back of his house. It is adequate and roomy. He feeds them with balanced feed and natural grass Once they reach optimal size, he sells them in different markets in the area and thus obtains good income to pay his household expenses. He also has cropland where he grows lemons and once he harvests them, he sells them at a good price in different markets. 

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1200 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed and fertilizers to improve his cropland. With the income he makes, he can cover his loan and improve his family's quality of life. Nolberto is a hardworking and responsible man who only wants his children to get ahead and improve financially to pay for their higher education, which is his goal.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals and fertilizer to improve his cropland.

loans.name: Fany

texts.es:
Fany tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Fany desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona o lo lleva a vender al mercado de Tambogrande, cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados para que se incremente la producción de leche y así podrá ofrecerlo aun mejor precio para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Fany es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su negocio crezca para que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades académicas.
texts.en:
Fany is 39 and lives with her husband and children in her own home. She has only electrical service and is located in a rural area in Tambo Grande district, in Piura department. This area is devoted to agriculture, cattle raising and handicrafts.

Fany has worked raising and selling livestock (cows) for several years. She keeps them in a  corral outside her house and feeds them natural feed and on natural pastures so they produce a good supply of milk. She provides milk to the inhabitants in the area or carries it to the Tambo Grande market to sell. She has steady customers because of the high quality milk she sells. She uses her income to settle her family’s obligations.

She has requested a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more feed to increase milk production so that she will be able to offer even better prices. Thus, she will repay the loan and improve her family’s quality of life. 

Fany is a hardworking, dedicated and responsible woman who wants only for her business to grow so that her children will have more academic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy more feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José de 26 años de edad, vive con su esposa en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

José desde hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias con la finalidad de solventar sus gastos diarios de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales como aves de corral y su respectivo alimento, con los ingresos que obtenga puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida. José es una persona trabajadora y muy empeñosa en lo que hace y lo único que quiere es que su esposa tenga algunas comodidades en casa.
texts.en:
José is 26, and lives with his wife in their own house, which only has electricity.  It is located in the rural area of Olmos district in Lambayeque department. This area is characterized by farming, livestock-raising, and handicrafts.

José has been raising and selling sheep for 4 years.  His corral is located outside his house, and is large and suitable for this purpose.  He provides them with balanced feed, and natural grazing, and when his animals attain their optimal growth he sells them in the different markets in the area. In this way,   he makes very good profits, with the goal of meeting his daily household expenses.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy more animals, such as poultry and their feed. With the income he gets, he can pay back his loan, and improve his quality of life.  José  is a hard-working person and very determined in what he does. All he wants is for his wife to have a few home comforts.

loans.use: To buy more animals and their feed.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase high-grade manure and pesticides, and to pay fees for his kids.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro de 61 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Morrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Alejandro se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza y comercialización de animales de corral (cerdos, patos y cuyes), sus corrales los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, granos y pastos  naturales, una vez que lleguen a su peso  y tamaño ideal lo ofrece a sus clientes en los diferentes mercados de la zona y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar sus necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales de corral, para engordarlos y luego comercializarlos en los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un buen precio por ellos y así pueda tener mayores ganancias para brindarle a su familia  una mejor calidad de vida.  Alejandro  es una persona dedicada a su trabajo y lo único que desea es poder brindarle a su familia algunas comodidades en su hogar y que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Alejandro  is 61 years old.  He owns the home where he lives with his wife and children.  The home does not have basic services.  It is located in a rural area in the Morope district, which is part of the state of Lambayeque.  The area is known for agriculture, livestock, and tourism. 

For many years, Alejarndro has raised and sold corral animals (pigs, ducks, and guinea pigs).  His corrals are behind his home.  He feeds his animals with balanced feed, grain and grasses.  Once they are at their ideal weight and size, he sells them to his customers in various markets in the area, and the income he earns meets his family's daily needs. 

He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa through Capital Semilla (Seed Capital) of 1000 new soles to purchase more livestock.  He will them and sell them at the markets in his area, with the goal of receiving a good price for them.  With greater earnings he can provide his family with a better quality of life.  Alejandro is very dedicated to his work and his only desires are to to be able to provide his family with some comforts in their home and that his business continues to grow.

loans.use: to purchase more animals for sale.

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
Erika nació en el distrito de Yanatile de la provincia de Calca (Cusco, Perú), tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas.  Ella alquila su taxi a S/. 25.00 nuevos soles a persona que desean brindar servicio de movilidad en la ciudad. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Erika requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. Su sueño de Erika es abrir un restaurante turístico en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco porque hay mucho movimiento de turistas. 

El Banco Comunal “El Molinito II” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú).  Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Erika was born in Yantile District, Calca Province (Cusco, Perú).  She is 25 years old and is single.  She currently lives in the city of Cusco where she carries out her economic activities.  She leases out her taxi for 25 new soles to people who want to provide transportation services in the city.  She’s been in this business for several years now and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  On this occasion, Erika needs the loan to service her car.  Erika’s dream is to open a tourist restaurant in downtown Cusco because there are a lot of tourists.

The “El Molinito II” (The Little Mill II) communal bank meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for its tourism, commerce and for its traditional, Inti Raymi, festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located there.

loans.use: to service her car.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William, tiene la edad 32 de  años, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal este próximo año. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y productos para aplicar al cultivo para mejorar la calidad de las matas y así aumentar la cosecha próxima. El cuenta con el terreno establecido ya desde varios años atrás y con una plantación en condiciones regulares por lo cual quiere asistirlo y mejorarlo. El tiene como meta aumentar las cosechas y generar mayores ingresos económicos para darle a su familia cada día una mejor calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William, aged 32, is married and lives with his 2 children and his wife, who are his highest priority. 

He intends to use the loan to buy supplies for tending to his coffee plantation for the coming year.  Specifically, he is going to buy manure and products to apply to the crop to improve the quality of the plants, and so increase his next harvest.  He can count on land that has already been already established for several years, and a plantation in fair condition which he wants to tend to and improve. 

His goal is to increase his harvests and generate more income to give his family a better quality of life on a daily basis.  

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not taken other loans previously from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to tend to his coffee crops.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
Carlos de 58 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con  todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Guadalupe que pertenece al departamento de la Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, ganadera y agrícola.

Carlos se dedica a brindar servicio de carga en su camión, lleva todo tipo de productos para el consumo diario de las personas, también lleva a otros sitios aledaños al lugar de donde vive, tiene su propia clientela, con esta actividad tiene 9 años y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos y necesidades diarias.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 3000 nuevos soles para brindarle mantenimiento a su camión y para comprar verduras para vender, con la finalidad de que con el dinero que gane pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Carlos con esfuerzo y trabajo trata de superarse en la vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 58 years old.  He owns the home he lives in with his family.  The house has all basic services and is located in the urban area of the Guadalupe district, which is part of the state of Libertad. This area is know for commercial activity, ranching, and agriculture. 

Carlos provides cargo transport services with his truck.  He transports all types of products for people's daily use.  He also transports items to other nearby towns.  He has his own customers and has had this business for 9 years.  The income he earns covers his expenses and daily needs.  He has requested a loan for Edpyma Alternativa for Seed Capital of 3000 new soles to perform maintenance on his truck and to purchase vegetables to sell.  The goal is to use the money he earns to pay off his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  With effort and hard work, Carlos is trying to improve his and his family's lives.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his truck and to purchase vegetables for sale

loans.name: Geovanny

texts.en:
Geovanny is a married women with three children. She lives in the city of Hato Mayor, a rural area where agricultural activities are common.

Geovanny sells different products such as accessories (earrings, rings, necklaces, bracelets, etc) and underwear. She has been running this business for four years. She has taken out seven loans with Kiva field partner Esperanza International over the past year. The loans, which have been paid back in full, were used to expand her business. Thanks to these loans, she had been able to make various changes in her home structure and provide for her family.

Her most important challenge is to finish studying and her favorite thing to do is enjoy time with her children and be at her house. She thanks all of you for supporting her dream to change her life and give her family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy womens accessories and underwear.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maritza; La socia tiene 48 años de edad, la socia es casada y  tiene 2 hijos de 23, 21 años de edad; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia realiza carteras, ella tiene su stand en el centro comercial confraternidad; la socia trabaja también para lelamente a esto vendiendo productos de belleza de las marcas de esika, avon y materiales para realizar las carteras. La socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales, la socia comprara cueros de colores, hebillas, argollas, lazos, telas, gamuzas, cierres, botones y otros materiales. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la realización de sus carteras.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the Virgen del Rosario de San Sebastián Communal Bank, which is located in the District of Huanchac in the Province and Department of Cusco.

Maritza is 48 years old, married and has two children who are 23 and 21 years old. She works in retail selling purses and her stand is located in the Confraternidad shopping center. Maritza also works selling Esika and Avon beauty products, as well as materials for making purses. She needs the loan to invest in the purchase of materials like colored leather, buckles, rings, bows, fabrics, suede, zippers, buttons and other items to make her purses.

Maritza is grateful for the support provided and promises to be disciplined in making her loan repayments.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of materials to make purses.

loans.name: Pascual

texts.es:
Pascual de 30 años de edad,vive con su esposa e hijos en casa de su padre, cuenta con servicio deluz solamente, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Guadalupe que pertenece al departamento de la Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial, ganadera y agrícola.

Desde hace 3 años Pascual se dedica a la fabricación y venta de ladrillos para construcción de casa, esta actividad es muy rentable, para seguir realizando dicha labor a solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar los materiales necesarios para seguir fabricando ladrillos y cumplir con algunos pedidos pendientes y con los ingresos que adquiera podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar elnivelde vida de su familia.

Pascual todos los días trabaja muy duro con la finalidad de que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades académicas y también mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Pascual is 30 years old.  He lives with his wife and children in his parents' home.  The house only has electricity.  It is located in an urban area of the Guadalupe district, which is located in the state of La Libertad. This area is known for commercial activity, ranching, and agriculture. 

For the past 3 years Pascual has had a business making and selling bricks for home construction.  This activity is very profitable.  In order to continue with this work, he is requesting a loan for 1500 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase materials he needs to make bricks to fill pending cusotmer orders.  With the income he earns he will pay off his loan and improve his family's quality of life. 

Pascual works very hard every day with the purpose of providing his children with academic opportunities and a better economic situation.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make and sell bricks.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia  D. 59 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio D. agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito D. Patapo que pertenece a la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

DesD. hace unos 3 años aproximadamente Lucia se ha dedicado a la venta D. abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,etc), útiles D. escritorio y D. bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel D. vida.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal D. que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones D. su casa.  Lucia es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades para su esposo y ella.
texts.en:
Lucia is 59 years old.  She owns the home where she lives with her husband.  The house has electricity and running water.  It is located in an urban neighborhood in Patapo, in the Chiclayo province.  This area is known for agricultural and ranching activities.  

For approximately the last 3 years, Lucia has sold groceries (daily use products such as milk, rice, cooking oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, etc.), stationery goods, and drinks.  Her business is located in her own home for her confort and safety.  The earnings from the sales of her products are used to try to cover her expenses and improve her quality of life. 

To stock her store, Lucia is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2000 new soles, which will be used to purchase more merchandise.  Her only goal is to grow her business and have more products to offer customers, in order to pay off her loan and her household obligations.  

Lucia is a responsible person, dedicated and hard-working, who works to have more comforts for herself and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando, tiene la edad 56 de años, está casado y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El lo que va comprar específicamente es el abono y productos para aplicar al cultivo para mejorar la calidad de la cosecha. El cuenta con el terreno establecido ya desde varios años atrás y con una plantación en condiciones buenas, por lo cual él quiere asistirlo y mejorarlo para mejores resultados. El pretende con el crédito realizar las ganancias económicas necesarias para seguir adelante con su proyecto  cafetalero  y generar ingresos económicos para el bienestar de su familia.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Orlando is 56 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son, who are his major priority. With this loan he intends to buy supplies for his coffee grove. Specifically, he plans to buy manure and products to apply to the trees to improve the quality of his harvest. Orlando has had an established field for many years now with a plantation in good condition, and he wants to help it improve in order to achieve better results.

With this loan Orlando hopes to realize the economic gains necessary to continue advancing his coffee project and generate added income for his family's  wellbeing.

This is Orlando's first loan acquired through FUDECOSUR. He has had no other loans from state banks, and FUDECOSUR has offered the loan with major facilities and the rate of interest is much lower.

loans.use: buy manure and inputs to improve his coffee crop.

loans.name: Javier Orlando

texts.es:
Javier de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Santa Cruz que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Javier se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral lo tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar las necesidades de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales de otras especies y una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga más clientes y así pueda tener mayores ingresos para brindarle a su familia  una mejor calidad de vida.  Javier es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que desea es que su familia salga adelante y siempre esté unida.
texts.en:
Javier is 43 years old.  He owns the home he lives in with his wife and children.  It does not have electricity and running water.  The home is located in a rural area of the Santa Cruz district, which is in the state of Cajamarca.  This area is known for agriculture, ranching, and tourism. 

For the past 2 years Javier has raised and sold pigs.  He has a corral behind his home.  He feeds the animals with balanced feed, and once they reach the optimal size he sells them to customers.  The income he earns pays for his family's basic needs. 

He has requested a loan from Edpyma Alternativa for 1500 new soles to purchase more animals of other species.  Once they are fattened, he will sell them at different markets in the area, with the goal of gaining more customers and having a higher income, in order to provide his family with a better quality of life.  Javier is very responsible and hard-working.  The only thing he wants is for his family to get ahead and always be together.

loans.use: to purchase more animals of other species to stock his business.

loans.name: Grace Eposi Ngu Kwende

texts.en:
Grace is married to a lovely husband and they are both blessed with seven children. Only one child is under 15 and some are in school. She lives in Ntasen, an area in Bamenda, in the north-west region of Cameroon.

Her major challenges in life has been the difficultly of her children dropping out of school and inadequate capital to start a business for herself before joining GHAPE. She has also suffered greatly from ill health. Given a loan, she plans to buy pig feed, firewood, medicines for the animals and to pay for the maintenance of her pigsty and the transportation of her newly bought piglets to their rearing site. 

Grace knows her business is going to succeed because she has acquired some basic training in financial management and pig rearing from GHAPE. She has also chosen to diversify her income by investing some of her capital in a firewood business and she has the land to support a successful business. The loan, if granted, will enable her to sell in her neighborhood at cheaper rates, providing firewood to her neighbors. She joined GHAPE in 2006 and has since successfully borrowed and repaid loans four times.

She will reinvest her profits back into her business and use part to it to care for her family. She will also use the proceeds to finish a construction plan she earlier started, building two new rooms. Her children’s school needs will also be taken care of. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the low cost of obtaining and paying back a loan.

About GHAPE 
The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach. Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses and family values. Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement. GHAPE instills a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: to buy feed, seeds, firewood and to pay for the maintenance of the pigsties and transportation of the piglets.

loans.name: Jorge Omar

texts.es:
Jorge de 26 años, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de la Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Jorge desde hace un año se dedica a la venta de combustible en la zona donde vive, este negocio no tiene mucha competencia, el mismo que se a ido incrementandose ultimamente y se a visto en la necesidad de solicitar un  préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar baldes y embases para vender combustible a sus clientes y con los ingresos podrá cubrir su crédito y solventar sus gastos personales.

Al observar Jorge que su negocio va creciendo, esto le permite seguir apoyando asus padres económicamente y podrá adquirir algunas cosas que necesita.
texts.en:
Jorge is 26, single, and lives in his parents' house, which only has electricity. It is located in the Matanza district in Piura department.  This area is characterized by farming and livestock-raising.  

Jorge has been selling fuel for a year, in the area where he lives.  This business doesn't have a lot of competition, so it has begun to increase lately. Now he finds himself having to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy drums and containers for selling fuel to his customers. 

With the income he will be able to pay back the loan and meet his personal expenses.  Noting that his business is beginning to grow, he says this will allow him to continue supporting his parents financially, and he will be able to to acquire a few things that he needs.

loans.use: To buy drums and containers for selling fuel.

loans.name: Tesla Nubia

texts.es: Tesla Nubia, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Rubí, tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijas, y reside en la Colonia 25 de Febrero. Su esposo trabaja como transportista en la ciudad de Tegucigalpa y sus hijas están estudiando. Tesla inició su actividad comercial en el 2002, con una venta de paletas de leche, charamuscas y chocobananos. Con el tiempo vio que le iba bien, así que un año después decidió instalar en una parte de su casa una venta de  productos de la canasta básica y solicito su primer préstamo en FAMA. A Tesla le encantaría poder ampliar el local de su negocio porque es muy pequeño y también poder surtirlo de más y variados productos. Su meta es seguir trabajando cada día para hacer crecer su negocio y de esa manera tener dinero para poder ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la familia y con el pago de los estudios de sus hijas, ya que para ellos es muy importante que se lleguen a realizar como profesionales. El préstamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar un frízer, ya que el que tenía se le daño. Con el apoyo del préstamo podrá comprar un nuevo frízer y ya no perderá de vender, pues hasta ahora lo ha dejado de hacer porque no tiene donde almacenar las carnes y los productos lácteos.  Tesla tiene 36 ciclos en FAMA y hasta la actualidad no ha tenido problemas de pago, y los préstamos recibidos le han ayudado mucho porque ahora ella y su familia tienen un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Tesla Nubia is a member of the Rubí Communal Bank.  She is 39 years old, married and has three daughters.  She lives in the 25 de Febrero neighborhood.  Her husband works in transportation in the city of Tegucigalpa and her children are in school.  Tesla started her business in 2002 by selling milk popsicles, charamusca (flavored ice in a bag), and frozen chocolate-covered bananas.  She saw that she did well over time, so she decided to set up a store in her house a year later to sell basic food items and she requested her first loan with FAMA.  Tesla would love to be able to expand her small place of business, as well as stock it with a variety of products.  Her goal is to continue working each day so that her business will grow and she will have money to help her husband support their family and pay for their daughters’ education, as it is very important for them that they become professionals.  She needs the loan requested to buy a new freezer and not lose sales.  She has stopped selling them for the time being because she doesn’t have a place to store meat and dairy products.  Tesla has completed 36 loan cycles with FAMA and has not had any problems with payment thus far.  The loans she has received have helped her greatly because she and her family now have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer to store meat and dairy products.

loans.name: Marcelino Federico

texts.es:
Marcelino de 47 años, es un hombre trabajador que tiene muchas proyecciones con su trabajo diario ya que conduce una mototaxi (medio de transporte que utiliza la gente para trasladar su mercadería). Todos los días recorre las calles del “Fortin” dando una tarifa en su recorrido de $ 0.25 por persona. 

Poco a poco ha incrementado su capital de trabajo con recorrido extenso y peligroso ya que el “Fortin” es una zona periurbana con caminos de tierra y montañas empinadas. Trabaja desde las 07h30 hasta las 16h30 todos los días. Tiene muchas esperanza con su moto taxi por eso quiere seguir trabajando para darle más estabilidad económica a su familia. Para ello quiere un préstamo y comprar cemento, varillas, bloques y mejorar así su casa.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 47 years old and is a hardworking man with many projections for his business, as he drives a mototaxi (a mode of transportation used by people to transport their merchandise). Every day he travels the streets of El Fortin, charging 25 U.S. cents per person.

He has increased his working capital little by little through extensive and dangerous travel, as El Fortin is a periurban area with dirt roads and steep hills. He works every day from 7:30am to 4:30pm. He has many hopes for his mototaxi, which is why he wants to continue working to provide his family with greater financial stability. For this reason, he wants a loan to buy cement, rods, and blocks to make housing improvements.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods and blocks.

loans.name: Jaime Mario

texts.es:
Jaime de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicios de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla Jaime  es la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) y caprino (cabras) desde hace unos años, el lugar donde cría  sus animales es en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada  y pastos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados, ya que cuenta con su propia clientela en la zona donde vive y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Ha solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar una mototaxi, lo que le permitirá tener otro ingreso para su hogar.  Jaime es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de los suyos, con la finalidad que en un futuro pueda brindarles mejores estudios superiores a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jaime, 43, lives with his wife and children in their own house, where they have light and water service. It is located in the district of Mórrope and department of Lambayeque, an area dedicated to agriculture, cattle and crafts.

Jaime's work is raising and selling sheep and goats, which he has done for some years. The place where he raises his animals is behind his house. He feeds them with balanced feed and natural pastures. Once they have reached the ideal size and weight, he offers them for sale at certain markets. He has his own clientele in the area where he lives and is able to cover his household's daily needs with the income he earns.

He has requested a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy a motorcycle taxi, which will allow him to have another source of income for his household. Jaime is a very well-known  person in the area where he lives because he is always preoccupied with the well-being of his friends and family. His goal is to be able to offer his children the opportunity for higher education.

loans.use: to increase his income by buying a motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina nació en el distrito de Ocobamba de la provincia de La Convención (Cusco, Perú), tiene 34 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre donde tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas.  Ella alquila su taxi a S/. 25.00 nuevos soles por día a persona que desean brindar servicio de movilidad en la ciudad. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Luz Marina requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. Su sueño de Erika es abrir un bar turístico en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco porque hay mucho movimiento de turistas. 

El Banco Comunal “El Molinito II” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú).  Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luz Marina was born in the district of Ocobamba in the province of La Convención (in Cusco, Peru).  She is 34 years old, and lives with her unmarried partner with whom she has two children.  Currently, she lives in the city of Cusco and this is where she undertakes her economic activities. She rents her taxi for 25 New Soles a day to people who want to provide transportation service in the city.  She's been working in this business for four years now, and doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

At this time, Luz Marina is requesting a loan for vehicle maintenance.  Her dream is to open a tourist bar in the heart of the city of Cusco because there are many tourists passing by.

The communal bank "El Molinito II" meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is known as a popular tourist area and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her car.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María de 41 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Motupe que pertenece al departamento de la Lambayeque.  Esta zona tiene como principal actividad la agricultura y ganadería.  

María se dedica  a la venta de frutas y agua mineral en unas mesas que a colocado en las afueras de su casa, aprovechando que es un lugar muy concurrido por personas, con una experiencia de 6 años , es por eso que es muy conocida y tiene su propia clientela,  las ventas de sus productos se han ido incrementando; al igual que sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida. 

El préstamo que solicitó a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla fue de 2000 nuevos soles, el cual lo va utilizar  para comprar mayor cantidad de fruta y otras bebidas para abastecer a su clientela, el aumento de sus ventas le permitirá cubrir su crédito y cumplir con sus obligaciones de casa.  María es una persona con muchos aspiraciones y uno de ellos es que con su trabajo y esfuerzo pueda tener más grande su negocio y contar con más comodidades en su casa para su familia.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old. She lives with her husband and children in their own house. The house only has electricty and is located in the district of Motupe in the department of Lambayeque.The area deals mainly in agriculture and livestock. 

Maria sells fruit and mineral water from some tables set up outside her house as it is a very popular locale. She has been doing this for the last 6 years. This why she is very well known and has a group of regular customers. Her sales have been growing steadily as has her income which goes to improving their quality of life.

She is asking Edpyme Alternativa via Capital Semilla for a loan of 2000 nuevois soles (PEN). She will use the loan to buy more fruit and different kinds of drinks for her customers. The increased sales will allow her to cover her loan and her household expenses. Maria has many aspirations, one of which is to expand her business, through hard work and effort, and have more amenities available in her home for her family.

loans.use: to buy a bigger variety of fruit and drinks to carry out her business

loans.name: Maria Haydee

texts.es:
María de 34 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, la cual pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

María desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (gallinas y patos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, con los ingresos que obtenega pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  María es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es poder superarse y  mejorar económicamente.
texts.en:
María, 34, lives with her family in her own house which has no basic utilities.  It is located in the rural area of the Mórrope District which belongs to the department of Lambayeque.  This area is known for its agriculture, livestock farming and handicrafts.

For many years María has been raising and selling small farm animals such as chickens and ducks.  She has a large pen in back of her house where she gives the animals balanced feed and natural grains so they can reach full development.  The different markets in the area are where she sells the animals to obtain a good income to cover household expenses.

She has requested a loan for 3,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and feed.  With the income she gets she plans to pay for the loan and improve her lifestyle.  María is very hard working and responsible, with a lot of amibition for getting ahead and improving her economic status.

loans.use: To buy more animals and feed.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Monsefú que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Miguel desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona o lo lleva a vender al mercado de Chiclayo, cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar más alimentos balanceados para que se incremente la producción de la leche de vaca y así podrá ofrecerlo aun mejor precio para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Miguel es una persona trabajadora y dedicada que lo único que quiere es que su negocio crezca para que sus hijos tengan mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Miguel, 46, lives with his wife and children in their own house with the only utility being electricity.  It is located in the rural area of the Monsefú District which belongs to the province of Chiclayo.  The activities in this area are mainly agriculture, livestock farming and handicrafts.

For several years Miguel has been raising and selling cattle.  He has a barnyard behind his house where he provides the cows with balanced feed and natural fodder so they can produce good milk.  He sells the milk to the locals in his area as well as at the market in Chiclayo.  He has a fixed customer base because of the quality of the milk he sells.  He uses his income to take care of household expenses.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 2,500 PEN which will be used to buy more balanced feed to increase dairy production.  This way he will be able to offer a better price which will facilitate payng back the loan and improving his family's lifestyle.  Miguel is a hard worker and very dedicated.  His main goal is to grow his business so his children can have better opportunities than he had.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Christine

texts.fr:
Cliente de 35 ans, celibataire avec 2 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 17 ans, vu sa charge, elle se decide un jour d'ouvrir une cabine telephonique pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
Ses revenus sont de 40.000frs a 60.000frs par jour, elle a une bonne stategie parcequ'elle a su fideliser ses clients.
Ayant deja beneficie d'un premier pret, elle a rembourse avec succes et a fait des epargnes considerables, pour ce second pret elle va s'approvisionner en stock de cartes comme cartes MTN a 100.000frs , Airtel a 80.000 frs, Sim a 40.000 frs.
Pour l'avenir , elle veut ouvrir une boutique pour vendre les telephones et accessoires et avec les benefices elle pourra subvenir a l'education de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Christine is 35 years old, single and the mother of two children, aged 12 and 17. Faced with the need to provide for her family, she decided one day to set up a telephone booth. She earns between 40,000 and 60,000 CFA francs per day. Her business strategy is good, because she has a loyal clientele.

After having been granted her first loan, which she has repaid successfully and which enabled her to save up a considerable amount of money, Christine applied for her second loan which she will use to buy recharge phone cards, such as MTN cards for 100,000 francs, Airtel cards for 80,000 francs and Sim cards for 40,000 francs.

Her plans for the future consist in the opening of a store to sell phones and accessories. She will use her profit to continue to provide her children with education.

loans.use: to buy recharge phonecards from various companies.

loans.name: Catherine Nsoh

texts.en:
This borrower is separated with three children and lives in a house provided by a family friend at Nchuobuh, a quarter in  Bamenda, North West Region of Cameroon.

She had difficulties in educating her children after she left her husband, not to talk of providing shelter for herself and the children. The situation became worst when she was driven out of the family house because she was not supposed to stay in the family house with her children. Her mother who was so supportive to her and two sisters who were also very supportive to her died, making her more frustrated. 

Given a new loan she plans to invest in the rearing of pigs, to purchase feed,piglets  and pay for the construction of a pig sty. She will also rent a piece of land for farming, pay for labour to do clearing of the farm, purchase seedling for planting and also invest in the buying and selling of fresh groundnuts. Her activity will help the community to provide food and manure from her pigs  farm . Her activity will also help to provide employment in that people will clear her farm and also transport her produce. She will pay for labor for the construction of a pig sty and tilling of her farm.

 She will plough back her profit into her business and use part to care for her family. She also will use the proceeds to pay her house rent. Her children’s school needs will be taken care of. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan.

loans.use: Purchase of piglets, pig feed, fence Constrution, renting of farm buying of seedlings and fresh groundnut.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
María D. 40 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicado en el distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla María  es la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino (ovejas) desD. hace unos años, el lugar donD. cría  sus animales es en la parte posterior D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada  y pastos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados, ya que cuenta con su propia clientela en la zona donD. vive y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias D. su hogar.

Ha solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más alimento balanceado para engordar a sus animales y ofrecerlos a sus clientes a un mejor precio, lo que le permitirá tener ganacias para pagar su crédito y nejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  María es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donD. vive porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar D. los suyos, con la finalidad que en un futuro pueda brindarles mejores oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, 40, lives with her husband and children in their own house which does not have basic utilities.  It is located in the TambogranD. District which belongs to the department of Piura.  The activities in this area are agriculture, livestock farming, and handicrafts.

The activity María has been involved in for several years now is raising and selling sheep.  They are kept in a pen behind her house and she gives them balanced feed and natural fodder.  Once they reach full development she takes them to the different markets, where she has her own customer base.  She uses her income to cover daily household expenses.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for her livestock.  She wants to offer her customers lower prices so she can increase earnings to pay for the loan and improve her family's lifestyle.  María is very well known where she lives because she is always worrying about her family's well-being and paving the way for her children's future so they will have the best opportunities available.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Felipa; La socia tiene 39 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y  tiene 1 hijo de 13 años de edad; la socia se dedica a la artesanía, la socia realiza diversos trabajos  en tejido, la socia teje chompas, chompones, guantes, gorros, medias, chalinas en lanas, ella teje también en alpaca, lanas finas, lanas de algodón, lanas matizadas, hilos y según los pedidos que le hagan ala socia, ella también compra botones para completar la chompa, La socia requiere el crédito para la compra de diferentes lanas según los pedidos que se le hagan y también comprar botones para las chompas en los colores y tonos que le pidan. La socia solicita el préstamo parta invertir en la compra de lanas de diferentes colores, grosores  y botones

 La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "VIRGEN DEL ROSARIO DE SAN SEBASTIAN".  The bank is located in the District of Huanchac in the Province of Cusco and Department of Cusco.

The member is Felipa: the member is 39 years old, she lives with her partner and has one child aged 13.  The member works doing handicrafts.  The member does various types of work with fabric, the member knits sweaters, gloves, hats, socks, and scarves from wool.
