She also knits using alpaca, fine wool, cotton, variegated wool, and yarn, and depending on the orders the partner has received, she also buys buttons to complete the sweaters.

The member is requesting the loan for the purchase of different types of wool in line with the orders she has received, and also to buy buttons for the sweaters in the different colors and shades that have been ordered.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in buying wool of different colors and thicknesses, and buttons.

The member appreciates the support being granted to her, and likewise agrees to comply in a disciplined manner with her repayments.

loans.use: to invest in buying wool of different colors and thicknesses, and buttons.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano de 50 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Mariano desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo los ofrece en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtiene buenas ganancias para solventar los gastos diarios de su hogar.  También cuenta con sus tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y una vez que cosecha lo comercializa a un buen precio en los diferentes mercados.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para compra de alimento balanceado y de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con los ingresos que obtenega puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Mariano es un hombre trabajador y responsable que lo único que quiere es mejorar económicamente para que sus hijos se superen.
texts.en:
Mariano, 50, lives with his wife and children in their own house which does not have basic utilities.  It is located in the rural area of the Tambogrande District which belongs to the department of Piura.  This area is known for its agriculture, livestock farming and handicraft activities.

For several years now Mariano has been raising and selling sheep.  He keeps them in a large pen behind his house and gives them balanced feed and natural fodder.  When they reach full development he sells them at the different markets in the area and earns a good profit which he uses for the daily household expenses.  He also has cropland where he grows lemons which he sells for a good price at different markets.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and fertilizer to improve his cropland.  He will use the income he gets to pay back the loan and improve his family's lifestyle.  Mariano is a hard worker and very responsible.  His goal is to improve his economic status so his children can get ahead.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed and cropland fertilizer.

loans.name: Yeni

texts.es:
Yeni de 33 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Yeni desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (gallinas y pavos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales, con los ingresos que obtenega puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Yeni es una persona trabajadora y empeñosa que lo único que quiere es poder superarse y  mejorar económicamente en bien de los suyos.
texts.en:
Yeni, 33, lives with her family in their own house which only has electricity as a basic utility.  It is located in the district of Cayaltí which belongs to the department of Lambayeque.  This area is known for its agriculture and livestock farming activity.

For several years now Yeni has been raising chickens and turkeys in a large pen behind her house.  She gives them balanced feed and natural grains so they can reach full development.  Then she sells them at the different markets in the area where she obtains a good profit which she uses to cover household expenses.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 500 PEN through Edpyme Alternative which will be used to buy more chickens, pay back the loan and improve her lifestyle.  Yeni is a hard worker and determined to get ahead and improve her economic status for her family's benefit.

loans.use: To buy more chickens.

loans.name: Ambe

texts.en:
She is single and she has four children. Only two are below 15 years of age and some are in school. She lives in Bamenda, Northwest region of Cameroon.

Her major challenges in life have been the difficulty of her children dropping out of school and  some being locked up in a police cell and inadequate capital to start up a business for herself before joining GHAPE. She has also suffered greatly from ill health. Given a loan she plans to buy Irish potatoes, cocoyams, yellow yams and local plums. She knows her business is going to succeed because she has acquired some basic training on finance management and marketing techniques from GHAPE and she has chosen to diversify business by also investing some of her capital in her farm and also, she has got support and hence success. The loan if granted will enable her to sell in her neighborhood at cheaper prices. She joined GHAPE in 2008, since then she has successfully borrowed and repaid loans two times.

She will plough back some of her profit into her business and use part to care for her family. She also will use the proceeds to pay her house rent. Her children’s school needs will be taken care of. She prefers GHAPE because of the training she frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan.

The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon.  GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach.  Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses, and family values.  Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement.  GHAPE instils a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes, cocoyams, yellow yams, and plums (a local fruit) for resale.

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es:
María de 30 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace unos 4 años aproximadamente María se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,etc), verduras y de bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías y verduras, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones de su hogar.  María es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades y mejoras para toda la familia.
texts.en:
María is 30 years old. She lives with her husband and children in their own house. The house has no basic services and is located in the rural district of Olmos in the department of Lambayeque. This area is known for its agriculture and livestock production.

For about 4 years Maria has been selling groceries (products used on a daily basis such as: milk, rice, oil, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, etc.), vegetables and beverages. For her own safety and comfort, she has set up the business in her own house. With the proceeds from the sale of her products she tries to cover all her costs and improve her family's standard of living.

In order to carry out her business, she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy more goods and vegetables, with the sole purpose of growing her business, having more products available for her customers and meeting her loan obligations and household expenses. Maria is a responsible person, dedicated and hard-working who cares about providing more household amenities and improvements for the whole family.

loans.use: to buy more goods and vegetables to stock her store.

loans.name: Tendoh Abraham

texts.en:
He is married with three children. He lives at Mile 90 Nsongwa, a quarter in Bamenda, North West Region of Cameroon. He is a farmer. He cultivates crops for sale. 

His activity was hindered by insufficient capital to buy his farm inputs, but since he joined GHAPE in 2005 there has been mutual support through the loans he obtains from GHAPE.

With his activity he is able to provide food, especially vegetables, in his community. This will go a long way to improving their diet. Also, he sells cheaper than others since he is the one who cultivates the items himself. Also, people will buy from him and resell in markets which will help provide employment. 

Given this loan he intends to expand his farm with the cultivation of rice at Wum which is located also in the North West region. He will pay for labour; buy fertilizer, chemicals, potato seeds, and manure. He will also continue his gardening around his home. He hopes his business will succeed because he has been doing this business for a long time which has enabled him to gain a lot of experience. Also, there is available land  to cultivate his crops with customers to buy his produce.

He plans to buy a car which will transport farm produce to market areas. He will plough back the proceeds obtained from this  loan to expand his farm.   He also will use the proceeds to pay his children school fees.  He prefers GHAPE because of the training he frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizers, chemicals, rice seeds, potato seeds, cocoyams and pay for labor.

loans.name: Segundo Isidoro

texts.es:
Segundo de 62 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad comercial y transporte público.

Desde hace unos 10 años aproximadamente Segundo se ha dedicado a la venta de productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, fideos y gaseosas, su negocio lo ha colocado en un puesto que tiene en el mercado Moshoqueque, en elcualatiende todos los días y con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y obligaciones familiares.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones de su casa.  Segundo es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a su familia porque se lo merece.
texts.en:
Segundo is 62 years old and lives with his family in their own house. The house is equipped with all utilities and is located in the built-up area of the district of José Leonardo Ortiz in the province of Chiclayo. This area is characterized by commercial activity and public transportation.

For some ten years Segundo has been selling daily products: milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna fish, pasta and soda. He has installed his business in a stall at the Moshoqueque market, where he serves his customers every day. He spends his profit from the sales on household and family expenditures.

In order to bolster his business, he came to the microfinance institution Edpyme Alternativa and applied for a loan of 1500 new soles to buy more goods, with the sole aim to see his business growing with more goods to offer to his customers, enabling him to pay the loan installments and household expenditures. Segundo is responsible, dedicated and hard-working. He is concerned with the comfort of his family because it deserves it.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his grocery.

loans.name: José Augusto

texts.es:
José de 48 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Ferreñafe que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

José se dedica a la venta de balones de gas que se utiliza para que las cocinas funcionen, actividad que viene realizando desde hace varios años, la cualno tien mucha competencia en la zona donde vive, cuenta con clientela fija que le realiza pedidos a los 30 días que es lo que normalmente dura un  balon de gas y con los ingresos que adquiera podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más gas para abastecer los pedidos de sus clientes y satisfacer su necesidad y con esas ganacias podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  José es un hombre responsable que con muchoesfurzo y sacrificio saca adelante a su familia porque como todo padre quiere que sus hijos sean profesionales en un futuro y puedan lograr lo que se propongan.
texts.en:
José is 48 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own house. The house is connected to water and electricity, and is located in the built-up area of the district of Ferreñafe in the province of Chiclayo. The area is known for farming, cattle rearing and tourism.

For several years José has been selling bottled gas for cooking. There is not much competition in his area. He has a loyal clientele which places orders at 30 days' intervals (the expected duration of a gas cylinder). He spends his income on family expenditures.

José came to the microfinance institution Edpyme Alternativa and applied for a loan of 1000 new soles to buy more gas to meet the demand of his customers and thus provide for his own needs. The profit will enable him to pay the loan installments and improve his quality of life. José is a responsible man who with much effort and sacrifice supports his family. Like any father he wants his children to become professionals in future and that they achieve what they set out to do.

loans.use: to buy bottled gas for cooking.

loans.name: Awah

texts.en:
He is married with three children. All his children are below fifteen years of age. He lives in Nchualam, a quarter in Bamenda, North West Region of Cameroon. He has been a GHAPE member since 2001. He has successfully managed and repaid his loans since he join GHAPE.

However, he will not stop thinking about a car accident that he was involved in that has affected his hand till today. Also the difficulties he encounters with the family, especially sickness. However the loans he has been obtaining from GHAPE have enabled him to provide some basic needs to his family.  Given a loan, he plans to purchase firewood (wood used in Cooking) and buy palm wine. Palm wine is a type of locally consumed wine gotten from the Raffia palm. It is usually white in color and very sweet when it is it fresh. It becomes more fermented as time passes. He will also buy kola nuts to retail. He hopes that his business will succeed since he has been doing this business for so many years. Also there is a ready market for his products since his business site is located in one of the small squares where many people gather for daily business activities. Also his site is not far from the main town.

He will plough back his profit into his business and use part to care for his family.He will also take care of himself to ensure that their family situation improved.   He prefers GHAPE because of the training he frequently receives and the low cost in obtaining and paying back a loan

loans.use: to purchase firewood, palm wine, Maggi  and kola nuts.

loans.name: Amigos Unidos Group

texts.es:
Ligia Mercedes, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Amigos Unidos, tiene 56 años de edad,  su familia esta integrada por su esposo que se dedica a las labores del campo y sus tres hijos varones y una hija mujer.  
Doña Ligia inició vendiendo ropa, nacatamales y otros productos, y desde hace ya 15 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan y rosquillas. Desde muy joven aprendió el oficio de horneado de pan, ya que unas vecinas de ella se  dedicaban a esa actividad y como era un poco curiosa siempre se escapaba de su casa e iba a ver como esas vecinas preparaban los insumos para elaborar el pan y luego lo horneaban. El trabajo lo realiza sola pero cuando le encargan bastantes pedidos busca a una persona para que le ayude.  Uno de sus  problemas es que la situación económica esta bien difícil y además hay más personas que se dedican a la misma actividad y no hay mucho mercado. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de azúcar, soda, levadura, manteca, leche, y harina. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá invertir en su negocio y eso le dará ingresos para sacar a su familia adelante. Doña Ligia tiene 14 años de trabajar con FAMA y gracias a Dios y a su familia que ha sido de mucho apoyo para ella, nunca ha quedado mal con el pago de sus cuotas. Su compañera de Grupo Maura Catalina se dedica a la venta de golosinas.
texts.en:
Ligia Mercedes is a member of the “Amigos Unidos” (Friends United) solidarity group.  She’s 56 years old.  Her family consists of her husband, who is a farmer, her three sons and one daughter.

Ligia started out selling clothes, nacatamales (Nicaraguan style tamales) and other products and for the last fifteen years she’s been baking bread and rosquillas (traditional cookies).  She learned how to bake bread while at a very young age since some of her neighbors were in this occupation and because she was a bit curious she’d sneak out from home to go see how these neighbors prepared the ingredients to make the bread and how they then baked it.

She does the work by herself but when she gets many orders she looks for someone to help her.  One of her problems is that the economic situation is very difficult and besides there are other people engaged in the same activity and the market isn’t very big.

She will use the loan to buy sugar, baking soda, yeast, shortening, milk and flour.  With support from the loan she will be able to invest in her business which will produce income to move her family forward.

Ligia has been working with FAMA for fourteen years and thanks be to God and to her family who have been very supportive of her, she’s never failed to make her payments.  Her group partner, Maura Catalina, sells snacks.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, baking soda, shortening, etc.

loans.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo Manuel tiene 47 años de edad, es casado vive con la esposa e hijos, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Segundo Manuel se dedica a la agricultura, comercio de productos de naranja y queso además se dedica a ganadería. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda, Guanujo y Echeandia.

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas, alimento para los animales y dinero para pagar el transporte para movilizar los productos. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos la competencia, los precios y daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo para trasladar los productos que vende. 

Le gusta salir de paseo, festejar las fiestas de carnaval y finados.
texts.en:
Segundo Manuel is 47 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and children in the Guaranda Canton in Bolivar Province.

The members of the communal bank "NUEVA ESPERANZA" ("NEW HOPE") meet in the La Capilla area.  It is a community that draws from the four corners of the Guaranda Canton, and is 25 minutes away. The members of this bank work in agriculture, business, construction and livestock management.

Segundo Manuel works in agriculture, in the business of oranges and cheese; he also has livestock.  He buys and sells products in the cities of Guaranda, Guanujo and Echeandia.

He is applying for this loan for the purchase of manure, seeds, animal feed and to provide money to pay for transportation to move his goods.  The loan will support him in meeting his financial needs and improving his agricultural activities. The challenges he faces are the competition, prices and damage to his crops.  His dream is to buy a vehicle to transport the products that he sells.

He likes to go for walks, and to celebrate at the Carnival and Day of the Dead festivals.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, animal feed, and provide money to pay for transport to move his goods.

loans.name: Chanelle Jelicka

texts.fr:
Cliente âgée de 29, mariée et  mère d’un enfant de 3 ans, ne trouvant pas de travail en fonction de son niveau universitaire, elle s’est lancée dans la vente de :
Chemise, sandales hommes et femmes sachets d’emballages, packs d’eau minérale, jus de fruits, biscuits 
Bien accueillir ses clients,  vendre à bon prix et épargner à partir de ses bénéfices est la stratégie qu’elle met en exergue pour assurer la croissance de son activité.
Vue la haute fréquence des clients, le crédit lui permettra de renforcer l’activité en achetant : 3 douzaines de chemises hommes, des sandales de tout genre, 10 packs d’eau pure, 30 douzaine de sachets d’emballages, 10 packs de jus de fruits pour enfants, 10 cartons de paquets de biscuits de différents gouts. 
Son ambition est de devenir grossiste.
Très dévouée, elle fait face à ses obligations familiales
texts.en:
Chanelle Jelicka is 29 years old, married and the mother of a 3-year-old child. Since she could not find a job corresponding to her university level of education, she launched her own business selling skirts, sandals for men and women, packaging bags, mineral water, fruit juice and cookies. A warm welcome to her customers, low prices and investing her profits: that's the reason why her strategy enables her to grow her business.

Since her store is much frequented, this loan will enable her to strengthen her activity and buy 3 dozens of men's shirts, sandals of all kinds, 10 lots of mineral water, 30 dozens of packaging bags, 10 lots of fruit juice cartons for children, 10 lots of various cookies.

Her ambition is to become a wholesaler. Chanelle is a very devoted lady and honors her family commitments.

loans.use: to buy mineral water, sandals, fruit juice and skirts.

loans.name: Serge

texts.fr:
Client Âgé de 37 ans, marié et père de 3 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 2 ans et 9 ans.
N’ayant pas de soutien considérable pour poursuivre ses études, il s’est lancé dans la fabrication des pots  et la décoration.
Vue la forte demande de ses produits, l’octroi du crédit lui permettra de renforcer son stock de matériaux en achetant : de l’argile, 3 boites de peintures de différentes couleurs, 3 moules multiformes, des colorants, 1 pelle, 1 truelle, une brouette. Pour assurer la croissance de son micro-entreprise, il épargne beaucoup.

Très ambitieux, il souhaite avoir une poterie moderne pour encadrer les jeunes désœuvrés pour équilibrer l’offre et la demande.
texts.en:
This client is 37 years old, married and the father of 3 children aged between 2 and 9.  

Without support for continuing his studies, he began making pottery and decorative items. Given the high demand for these products, a loan will allow him to increase his stock by purchasing: clay, 3 boxes of different colored paints, 3 multi-shape molds, colorants, 1 shovel, 1 trowel and 1 wheelbarrow. 

He has been saving hard to guarantee expansion of his micro-business. His ambition is to have a modern pottery studio where he could help unemployed youngsters, and find a balance between supply and demand.

loans.use: to buy clay, bags of cement, shovels, wheelbarrows, paint and glazes.

loans.name: Fredy Carlos

texts.es: El Sr. Fredy es soltero, vive con su padre y hermana a los cuales apoya económicamente, su principal ingreso es dedicarse al transporte urbano en su moto taxi, se dedico a esta actividad, puesto que su madre le regaló la moto antes de fallecer y así poder apoyarlo, trabaja todo el día por el cercado de la ciudad de Ica. El préstamo lo va a invertir para hacer mantenimiento total a su moto y colocarle techo de fibra de vidrio y así poder dar un mejor servicio, su sueño es comprarse un auto y poder brindar el servicio de taxi. El Sr. Fredy está muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Fredy is single, lives with his father and sister, both of whom he financially supports.  His main income is from providing urban transport in his mototaxi (small vehicle pictured above).  He has worked in this business since his mother gave him the moto before she died and has been able to support it.  He works everyday in the outskirts of the city of Ica.  He is going to use the loan to invest in the total maintenance of his moto and to install a fiberglass roof, in order to offer better service.  His dream is to purchase a car and be able to provide a taxi service.

Fredy is very grateful for the loan being offered.

loans.use: to provide routine maintenance for his mototaxi

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
Don Francisco de profesion zapatero, el cual elabora zapatos nuevos y de variedad de estilo de varon, con mas de diechiocho años. El cual comenzo con poca mercaderia, y que ha venido creciendo con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en cuatro ciclos todos invertidos en materia prima.
Su esposa esta vendiendo tortillas, el cual, ayuda con los gastos de sus tres hijos. Don Francisco espera invertir con este nuevo prestamo en la compra de ciento veinte pie de cuero, 48 pares de zuelas,, 6 yardas de charol, 18 pares de zuela de sandalias, un galon de pega blanca, un galon de pega amarrilla, 4 docenas de cordones. Todo esto para elevar su produccion.
texts.en:
Francisco is a cobbler by profession.  He manufactures new men’s shoes in a variety of styles.  He’s been in business for more than 18 years.  He started out with very little merchandise that he’s gradually increased thanks to Afodenic financing.  He’s been in four cycles and used all of them to invest in raw materials.

His wife is selling tortillas which helps him with the expenses of his three children.  Francisco hopes to use this new loan to buy 120 feet of leather, 48 pairs of soles, 6 yards of patent leather, 18 pairs of sandal soles, a gallon of white glue, a gallon of yellow glue, 4 dozen shoe laces; all of this to increase production.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to manufacture new shoes.

loans.name: Emigdio

texts.es:
Emigdio tiene 42  años, vive en Sonson Antioquia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, el se dedica a la elaboración de cajas de madera – tablilla para almacenar frutas y verduras.

Esta labor la aprendió luego de quedar sin empleo y en la búsqueda del sustento para su familia un primo le enseñó hacer estas cajas y él entonces comienza a trabajar y a vendar las cajas en la plaza de mercado del pueblo y sus alrededores.

Su hijo menor es quien le ayuda en las tardes, sin embargo en necesita compra materia prima para poder incrementar sus ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Emigdio, age 42, lives in Sonson Antioquia with his wife and their four children. 

He makes wooden boxes to store fruit and vegetables.  He learned this work after being left without a job.  He was looking for a way to support his family.  A cousin taught him how to make these boxes.  He then started to work and to sell the boxes in the plaza of the town market and in surrounding areas. 

His youngest son helps him in the afternoons.  However, he needs to buy raw material to be able to increase his income and improve his wife’s and his children’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy raw material.

loans.name: Diana Marbelly

texts.es:
Diana, de 33 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de León, tiene dos hijos de 15 y 3 años de edad respectivamente, ella es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de mariscos en un local ubicado en el mercado de la terminal de buses  de León. Inicio en este negocio a travez de su familia pues quien vendía mariscos era su madre, ambas trabajaban juntas vendiendo mariscos pero con el tiempo su madre se jubilo y le cedió el negocio ella lleva 5 años dirigiendo el negocio desde el retiro de su madre. 
Requiere el préstamo para comprar un freezer donde pueda almacenar sus mariscos. De esta manera podrá conservar mejor sus productos, reducir el gasto que le genera comprar hielo para mantener frescos sus mariscos. Su próxima meta es hacerle mejoras su local y comprar 2 termos para almacenar mariscos.
texts.en:
Diana, 33, lives in the city of León.  She has two children who are 15 and 3 years of age, respectively.  She’s a merchant.  She sells seafood in a stand located in the market in León’s bus terminal.  She started the business through her family because her mother sold seafood.  They both worked together selling seafood but her mother retired and passed the business on to her.  She’s been running it for the last five years since her mother retired.

She needs the loan to buy a freezer to store her seafood so that she can preserve her products better and reduce the cost of buying ice to keep it fresh.  Her next goal is to make some improvements to her stall and to buy two insulated chests to store the seafood.

loans.use: to buy a freezer to store her seafood.

loans.name: Angel Eduardo

texts.es:
Angel Eduardo tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero vive con los padres, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Angel Eduardo se dedica a la agricultura de maiz, cianza de animales y a trabajar de chofer en una camioneta. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda, Guanujo.

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas, alimento para los animales. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos la competencia, los precios y daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar terrenos para dedicarse solo a la agricultura. 

Le gusta hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas de carnaval.
texts.en:
Angel Eduardo is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the canton of Guaranda in Bolivar Province.

The members of the communal bank “New Hope” meet in the "Four Corners" neighborhood of La Capilla sector, in the canton of Guaranda, 25 minutes from town.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, commerce, construction, and livestock.

Angel Eduardo works in corn farming, raising animals, and as a truck driver.  He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda, Guanujo.
He requests this credit to buy manure, seeds, and feed for the animals.

The loan will help him meet his financial needs and improve his agricultural activities.  He faces challenges like competition, prices, and crop damages.  His dream is to buy land to be able to dedicate himself entirely to farming.

He likes to play sports and enjoy the carnival festivities.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, and animal feed.

loans.name: Jimena Adriana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “GRANITO DE MOSTAZA”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia Jimena; La socia tiene 22 años de edad, la socia es soltera; la socia es docente de inicial, la socia trabaja en un prestigioso colegio particular en el nivel de primaria, ella enseña ingles a sus alumnos, la socia requiere el crédito para pagar su curso de capacitación, es un curso dirigido a docentes de nivel inicial, es una pedagogía, y la socia quiere asistir para lo cual ella requiere el préstamo para invertir en sus estudios. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el pago de sus estudios.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Granito de Mostaza" (Grain of Mustard Seed) communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.  Jimena is 22, single, and a primary school teacher.  She works in a prestigious private school at the primary level. She teaches English to her students. 

She needs the loan to pay for a training course directed at primary teachers. It is a teacher training course, and the member wants to attend, so she needs the loan to pay for her studies.  

The member is thankful for the support she has been given, and furthermore, she is committed to making her instalment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: To pay for teacher education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Gonzalo Enrique

texts.es:
Gonzalo Enrique tiene 28 años de edad, es casado vive con la esposa e hijos, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Gonzalo Enrique se dedica a la construccion y ejoramiento de vivienda, ademas al comercio de chochos, tambien a la agricultura siembra de maiz y trigo tambien crianza de anilames de corral. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para compra de abonos, semillas, alimento para los animales.  El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la competencia, los precios y daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es contriur la casa y comprar terrenos para cultivar. 

Le gusta escuhar musica y festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Gonzalo Enrique is 28 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

The members of V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA (V.R.C. NEW HOPE), are located in the sector La capilla, in the Four Corners community in the canton of Guaranda.  Within 25 minutes of each other, the members of this group work in agriculture, business, construction, and stockbreeding.

Gonzalo Enrique works in constuction and home improvement, as well as selling chochos (bean-like seeds), planting corn and wheat and raising animals.  He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda.

He requests the loan to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and animal feed.  The loan will help allow him to compensate for his financial needs and improve his farming practices. He faces challenges such as competition, prices and crop damage.  His dream is to build a house and buy land to cultivate.

He enjoys listening to music and celebrating the carnaval.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and animal feed

loans.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo Manuel tiene 59 años de edad, es casado vive con la esposa e hijos, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Segundo Manuel se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, cebda y maiz en terrenos propios tiene una cuadra, crianza de animales, . Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda, Guanujo.

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas y alimento para los animales.  El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la competencia y daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo y mas terrenos para ampliar el negocio. 

Le gusta descarsar y bailar en las fiestas de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Segundo Manuel is 59, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar.  The members of  Nueva Esperanza (New Hope) village bank live in the "Four Corners" neighborhood of La Capilla sector, in the canton of Guaranda, 25 minutes from town. The members of this bank work in farming, retail, construction and the raising of livestock.  

Segundo Manuel is a farmer, and grows potatoes, barley and corn on his own land. He also has a stable and raises animals  He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda, and the town of Guanujo. He is applying for the loan in order to buy fertilizer, seeds, and feed for his animals. The loan will help him meet his financial needs, and make improvements in his farming. 

He faces challenges such as competition and crop damage.  His dream is to buy a vehicle, and more land, in order to expand his business.  He likes to take a break and to dance in community fiestas.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds, and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Ella a sus 28 años y con dos hijos trabaja para ellos en un carro de comidas rápidas en semana al frente de su casa y los fines de semana en el parque principal del municipio de Sonson.

Ella quiere tener mas adelante un restaurante para así poder incrementar sus ingresos y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y un mejor futuro, pero mientras tanto quiere tener mas variedad de comidas para ofrecer a sus clientes y así empezar a construir su sueño.
texts.en:
Sandra Milena is 28 years old and the mother of two children for whose well-being she works. She sells fast food from her cart: during the week in front of her home and on weekends in the main city park in Sonson.

She wants to have a restaurant later on in order to increase her income and give her children a better quality of life and a brighter future. In the meantime she wants to offer her customers a greater selection of food and start building the object of her dream.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Gloria Marlene

texts.es:
Gloria Marlene tiene 32 años de edad, es casado vive con el esposo e hijos, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Gloria Marlena se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas y maiz ademas a la comercializacion de legumbres. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda, Guanujo.

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas y dinero para pagar el transporte de las legumbres. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la competencia,  daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo para trasladar los productos que vende al mercado.

Le gusta salir de paseo junto a la familia.
texts.en:
Gloria Marlene is 32, married, and lives with her husband and children in the canton of Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar.  The members of  Nueva Esperanza (New Hope) village bank live in the "Four Corners" neighborhood of La Capilla sector, in the canton of Guaranda, 25 minutes from town. The members of this bank work in farming, retail, construction and the raising of livestock.  

Gloria Marlena is a farmer, and grows potatoes and corn. She also sells vegetables. She buys and sells her products in the city of Guaranda, and in the town of Guanujo. She is applying for the loan in order to buy fertilizer, seeds, and money to pay for transporting her vegetables.  The loan will help her meet her financial needs, and make improvements in her farming. 

She faces challenges such as competition and crop damage.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle to transport the produce she sells to market. She likes to go out walking with her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds, and money to pay for transporting vegetables to market.

loans.name: Hector Leonidas

texts.es:
Hector Leonidas tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero vive con los padres y con los hermanos , en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C NUEVA ESPERANZA, se encuentra en el sector La capilla, comunidad cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda, a una distancia de 25 minutos, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, comercio, construcción y ganadería.

Hector Leonidas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, papas y cebada en terrenos de los padres. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas y fertilizantes para los cultivos. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como la competencia, los precios y daños en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo y un terreno propio. 

Le gusta estudiar hacer deporte y festejar las fiestas de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Hector Leonidas is 19 years old, single, and living with his parents and siblings in the canton of Guaranda in Bolivar Province.

The members of the Nueva Esperanza Communal Bank meet in the La Capilla sector, a neighborhood that takes up four blocks of Guaranda Canton 25 minutes away.  The members of this communal bank work in farming, trade, construction, and ranching.

Hector Leonidas farms, growing corn, potatoes, and barley on his parents' land.  He buys and sells his products in the city of Guaranda.

He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for his crops.  The loan will help him meet his economic needs and improve his farming business.  He faces challenges such as competition, prices, and crop damage.  His dream is to buy an automobile and his own land.

He likes studying, playing sports, and celebrating community events.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds for his crops

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: Marleni, de 28 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Eduardo y de su pequeño hijo Luis. En armonía familiar ellos viven en el caserío de Cumutay (sierra peruana).Desde muy joven se dedica a la agricultura, aprendió las técnicas del cultivo ayudando en la labor a sus padres, luego cuando formo su propia familia empezó a trabajar junto a su esposo. Dice que la labor de campo es muy sacrificada, pues siembra papa y alverja en sus chacras propias, y debe vigilar sus cultivos todos los días, desde muy temprano, para cuidarlos de las plagas y las inclemencias del tiempo que muchas veces afectan y atacan sus cultivos. Ahora se encuentra sola en esta labor, ya que su esposo comenzó a trabajar como peón en la fabricación de una hidroeléctrica. Lo que le disgusta es cargar los pesados sacos de sus productos naturales, para llevarlos a comercializar hasta los mercados de la ciudad. Y como es una mujer emprendedora para más adelante tiene planeado aumentar su producción, además quiere comprar ganado vacuno para criarlo y luego venderlo a mayor precio. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde promete ser puntual y responsable en el pago de sus cuotas, además esta muy agradecida con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito. Marleni de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de alverja para su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Marleni, 28 years old, lives in her own house in the company of her husband Eduardo and her small son Luis.  In the harmony of a family, they live in the small hamlet of Cumutay (Peruvian mountains).  Since she was very young, she has worked in agriculture and learned farming techniques by helping her parents.  Later, when she began her own family, she started to work together with her husband.  She says that working in the fields requires a lot of sacrifice.  She sows potatos and peas on their small farm and must take care of the plants daily, starting very early in the morning, in order to protect them from pests and inclement weather that often affect and attack their crops.  Now she finds herself working alone, since her husband began to work as a laborer in the production of a hydroelectric plant.  What she dislikes is carrying the heavy sacks full of her natural produce to sell in the city markets.  And becuase she in an enterprising woman, she has a plan to soon increase her production.  Also, she would like to buy cattle to raise and then sell at a higher price.  She belongs to the communal back "Lindo amanecer de Cumutay" ("Beautiful dawn of Cumutay") and this is the ninth loan with MFP, where she promises to be punctual and responsible in her monthly payments.  Moreover, she is very grateful to all the people who made this loan possible.  On receiving your support, Marleni will invest the money in the purchase of a bag of pea seeds for the next sowing season.

loans.use: to invest the requested money in purchasing a bag of pea seeds for the next sowing.

loans.name: Lilia Erminia

texts.es:
Lilia tuvo fuerzas para seguir luchando luego de quedarse viuda, y a sus 54 años tuvo que pensar en subsistir, por lo cual hizo lo posible para poner su Depósito de Bebidas. Tuvo mucha suerte ya que en el sector no tuvo competencia. El trabajo lo realiza sola desde muy temprano, y como está ubicado en su propia casa se le facilita todo. 

Dentro de sus actividades ella realiza la venta de líquidos como colas, jugos helados que es lo mismo que desea comprar para incrementar su negocio, para ello aplicará para un préstamo. Sus hijos que ya son mayores de edad se sienten orgullosos y siempre la apoyan en todo cuanto pueden.

Para mejorar sus ingresos ella sueña comprarse un taxi y alquilarlo en una cooperativa dentro del sector de Duran que es donde ha vivido muchos años.
texts.en:
Lilia had the strength to keep fighting after she was widowed.  At 54 years of age she had to think about surviving.  She did what she could to establish her business of warehousing drinks.  She was very lucky because she had no competition in her sector.  She works alone starting very early in the morning.  As the business is located in her own house, it makes everything easier.

Among her business activities is selling liquids like colas and juices and ice cream.  These are the same things she wishes to buy in order to increase her business.  That is why she is requesting a loan.

Her children are adults, and she is proud of them.  They always help her as much as they can.

In order to improve her income she dreams of buying a taxi.  She would rent it to a cooperative in the Duran sector, which is where she has lived for a long time.

loans.use: to buy colas, juices, and ice cream.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume and miscellaneous goods.

loans.name: Isabel Hilda

texts.es:
Desde muy pequeña a Hilda de 62 años le gusta mucho el arte de cocinar,es por ello que pensó en tener su propio negocio de desayunos y almuerzos, su hija que es mayor de edad la ayuda en el mismo. Especifica que el plato que mas sale es el caldo de salchicha el cual es un plato típico de Guayaquil, por este motivo lo hace con mucho entusiasmo y dedicación. 

La inseguridad es algo que le preocupa en la zona que vive por ser una zona periurbana es una situación que está a la orden del día. Sus hijos que ya son adultos consumen sus platos ya que les gusta mucho la forma como preparan la comida.

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere un préstamo el cual lo piensa utilizar para comprar cemento, arena, piedras para construir un buen local donde se hiciera realidad su gran sueño, tener su negocio bien establecido.
texts.en:
Ever since Hilda, age 62, was very little she has really liked the art of cooking.  That is why she thought of having her own business making breakfasts and lunches.  Her daughter, now an adult, helps her with the business.

Specifically, the dish she sells the most is “caldo de salchicha” (soup with sausage).  It is a typical dish in Guayaquil.  That is why she makes it with great enthusiasm and dedication.

The lack of safety in the zone where she lives, a peri-urban zone, is something that worries her.  It is a commonplace occurrence.  

Her children, who are now grown, eat her dishes because they really like the way she prepares food.

In order to continue with her business she wants the loan to buy cement, sand, and rocks to build a good place where she would make her big dream, having a well-established business, a reality.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and rocks.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.es:
Mary de 40 años se vió en la necesidad de apoyar en los gastos a su familia, así es que decidió dedicarse a la venta de comidas rápidas, lo cual la hace sentir útil cuando colabora en la educacíon de sus hijos.

Las ventas la realiza desde la 16h00pm extendiéndose hasta las 21h00pm. Junto a Rubén su esposo quien es albañil tuvo 3 hijos cada uno de 13, 8 y 9 años los que estudian en el colegio fiscal.

Entre sus planes está hacer un préstamo y comprar una cocina industrial, platos y varios que necesita para mejorar su negocio. Además que con sus ganancias ella sueña ver a sus hijos profesionales y que tengan un mejor provenir.
texts.en:
Mary, age 40, saw the necessity of helping her family with their costs, so she started selling fast food. This makes her feel useful when she helps provide her children with an education.

She makes her sales from 4:00 pm until 9:00 pm. She and her husband Ruben, a bricklayer, have 3 children ages 13, 8 and 9 who attend public school.

Her plans include taking out a loan and buying an industrial kitchen, dishes and various items that she needs to improve her business. Above her earnings, she dreams of seeing her children as professionals and for them to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial kitchen, plates, and glasses.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana de 31 años junto a su esposo trabajan desde las 6:30am hasta las 22:00pm, ella cuenta que inició y aprendió el trabajo siempre con sus padres.El hecho de vivir en una zona de dificil acceso le hace temer ser víctima de la delincuencia, aunque aduce que ya es algo de lo que hay que cuidarse. 

Ella relata que cuando sus 2 niños llegan de la escuela le ayudan a atender a sus clientes, claro está luego de hacer sus tareas diarias. El hecho de abastecer la tienda le hace tener como prioridad no muy lejana de comprarse un vehículo, y es por este motivo que desea hacer un préstamo para comprar arroz, aceite, sal y viveres en general, con lo que podría reunir el dinero y lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Ana, age 31, and her husband work from 6:30 am to 10:00 pm. She tells us that she started and learned the business with her parents. Living in a hard-to-access zone makes her afraid of being a victim of crime, although she says that that is always something for which one should be on guard.

She tells us that when her 2 children arrive home from school, they help her to tend to her customers. This is, of course, after they do their daily homework. In order to stock her store, her priority for the near future is to purchase a vehicle. For this reason she wants to take out a loan to purchase rice, oil, salt and general supplies, with which she will gain the necessary money and achieve her goal.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, milk and general supplies.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is a mother of three children and they live together with their father (her husband).  She lives in the city of Hato Mayor. This is a rural area where agricultural activities are common.

She is dedicated to selling ice cream, groceries, candies, and snacks; she had a candy store, and she also sold ice cream to her neighbors from her home. She had been running this business for around 10 years, and she started her business with her own savings. After some  years without having any business at all, she decided to take her first loan from Esperanza and restart her business. 

Sonia will use this loan to expand her business inventory by purchasing ice cream, groceries, candies, and snacks. Her business profits will be used to reinvest and save, as she is looking to provide for her children's studies.

She really enjoys working. She thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: to buy ice cream, groceries, candies, etc.

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.en:
Nadezhda is married and has two grown children who live with her. She sells sports outfits and footwear in the central market of her home town Melitopol. Nadezhda’s kiosk is located in a busy part of the market which helps her keep her business running. She has been in this trade for 10 years. 

Nadezhda’s trade has benefited a lot from lending services. She has repaid all her previous loans without any problems. This time Nadezhda is requesting a loan of 10,000 Grivnyas to purchase assorted merchandise and generate additional income. She enjoys working with this type of inventory and believes it is a niche where she feels most comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase assorted merchandise

loans.name: Judith Victoria

texts.es:
Judith de 24 años de edad tuvo una idea con la liquidación de su esposo al quedar este desempleado, y por ello compraron un moto para ingresarla al negocio de transportar pasajeros desde las estaciones de los buses hacia los sectores en donde estos no tienen acceso (Tricimoto).

Su esposo trabaja desde la 6h00 am hasta las 19h00 pm, pero como todo trabajo que tiene sus peligros e inseguridades en este no es la excepcion, y se debe de cuidar mucho.

Tienen un hijo de 6 años que está en la escuela y por el cual luchan pensando en un mejor provenir; con el préstamo que necesitan comprar material de construccíon para mejoras en su casa. El sueño de ambos es adquirir un auto y trabajarlo como taxi.
texts.en:
When her husband was fired, Judith, age 24, got an idea. When he remained unemployed, they bought a Tricimoto (a motorcycle with an attached cart) in order to start a business transporting passengers from the bus stations to the areas where they wouldn't otherwise have access.

Her husband works from 6:00 am to 7:00 pm, but as any job has its risks and insecurities and this job is no exception, he has to take great care.

They have one 6-year-old who is in school and for whom they work hard with a better future in mind. With this needed loan, they will purchase construction materials for home improvements. Their dream is to acquire a car and use it as a taxi.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 40 years old and lives in the town of Pallisa in the Iganga region of Uganda.  He is married and has 3 children.  Two of his children are currently in school.  Simon has a small retail shop that sells sugar, which he has had for 5 years.         

To help expand his business, Simon has requested a loan of 1,600,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase essential commodities like sugar for resale.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Simon hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children.  In the future, Simon hopes to expand his business.  Simon is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise program (SEP), which has helped his prospects for the future by improving his business.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities like sugar for resale.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 35 years old and lives in the town of Soroti in the Mbale region of Uganda. He is married and has 5 children. Four of his children are currently in school. Samuel has a business of a small retail shop that sells electrical items, which he has had for 5 years.         

To help expand his business, Samuel has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase electrical materials for resale. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Samuel hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. In the future, Samuel hopes to expand his business. Samuel is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise program (SEP), which has helped his future prospects by improving his business.

loans.use: to purchase electrical materials for resale.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is 31 years old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda.  He is married and has five children. Two of his children are currently in school.  Anthony has a business of a small retail shop that sells sugar that he has had for four years. He also does farming as his second business.  

To help expand his business, Anthony has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase essential commodities like sugar for resale.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Anthony hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. In the future, Anthony hopes to expand his business.  Anthony is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise program (SEP), which has helped his future prospects by improving his capital.

loans.use: to purchase essential commodities like sugar for resale.

loans.name: Eduardo Edwar

texts.es: Eduardo, de 23 años, vive en la casa de su madre Agripina, junto a su hermano mayor Orlando y su sobrino Etson. Juntos habitan en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde muy joven ayudaba a sus padres en las largas faenas agrícolas y así aprendió todo lo necesario para cultivar, es por eso que en la actualidad siembra papa, alverja y maíz junto a su hermano, en las chacras de su madre. Le gusta la labor agrícola, pues dice que le gusta vigilar las tierras con dedicación, brindándoles los insumos necesarios para que produzcan productos de calidad. Cuando es tiempo de cosecha, contratan la ayuda de operarios, y de esta manera venden toda su producción a los mayoristas de la ciudad, quienes le pagan regulares precios, sobretodo por la alverja, que es una legumbre bastante cotizada en el mercado nacional. Como es un joven emprendedor para más adelante desea adquirir más terrenos agrícolas, ya que solo posee 2 y a veces alquila otros. Como joven lleno de ambiciones, desea también, abrir una tienda de fertilizantes en su ciudad.Él pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde esta muy agradecido con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito, que les permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Eduardo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales y guano de corral para comenzar su siembra de papa “única”. Donde espera obtener una producción de 20 sacos.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 23, lives in his mother, Agripina’s, house with his older brother, Orlando, and his nephew, Etson.  They all live together in the hamlet of Cumutay.  Since very young he’s helped his parents with the long farming chores and that’s how he learned everything about farming.  

He currently grows potatoes, peas and corn with his brother in his mother’s fields.  He likes farming because he says that he enjoys being vigilant over his fields providing the necessary supplies so that they will produce high quality products.  When it’s time for harvesting, they hire day workers in order to sell their entire harvest to wholesalers in the city who pay regular prices, especially for the peas, which is quite a highly sought after legume in the national market.

Because he’s an enterprising young man he wants to acquire more farmland in the future because he only has two now and sometimes he leases more.  As a young man who is full of ambition, he also wants to open a fertilizer store in his city.

He is a member of the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay” (Beautiful Cumutay Daybreak) and this is his fifth MFP loan.  He is very grateful to all the people who made this loan possible that will allow them to continue working in search of progress.

If Eduardo were to receive your support, he will use the requested money to buy several sacks of natural fertilizer and barnyard guano to start planting “Unica” potatoes where he hopes to obtain a production of 20 sacks.

loans.use: to buy several sacks of natural fertilizer and barnyard guano to start his crops of Unica potatoes.

loans.name: Sirenachayoc Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SIRENACHAYOC”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jaqueline Julieta; ella es conviviente y tiene 27 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de cabinas de internet en su cabina también vende recarga de teléfonos por vía internet, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 a.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar y ampliar el negocio de cabinas de internet y negocio de recarga de teléfonos. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementa la cabina de internet, comprar repuestos para el mantenimiento de las computadoras y para pagar las líneas de teléfono para la recarga.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de madera, negocio de transporte, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de platería, negocio de tienda de abarrotes.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Jacqueline Julieta, 27, is the member.  She has a spouse and two children.  She works in her Internet access booth business and also sells telephone recharge services via Internet.  She works from 8am until 9pm.  Through the business she’s able to support her children.  She wants to equip and expand the Internet access booth business and the telephone service recharges.  She is asking for the loan to equip the Internet booths, to buy replacement parts for and to service the computers and to pay for the telephone lines for the recharges.

The other group members sell lumber, provide transportation, sell crafts, sell items made of silver and tend to grocery stores.

The member thanks those who are sharing in her dream through this means and pledges to make her installment payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to set up Internet access booths, to buy spare parts for the computers and to pay for the telephone lines.

loans.name: Esforzados Y Valientes Group

texts.en:
Yohanna is the coordinator of the Group Esforzados y Valientes (Hardworking and Brave), located in the city of Samanan. She lives in the beautiful town of Samana with her only child. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity. Yohanna sells clothing and handbags. With this new loan, she is planning to invest in both to expand her inventory.

Yohanna is very excited to receive her first loan from Esperanza International after having successfully repaid her previous loan and thus having taken a step toward expanding her business. Her challenges are to have a successful business and her own house. She is planning to save her profits.

Yohanna is hoping to make her dreams come true, have a prosperous life and a good business. She thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy clothing and handbags.

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.en:
Muhammad is 36 years old and lives in the town of Pallisa in the Iganga region of Uganda.  He is married and has three children. All of his children are currently in school. Muhammad has a business of a small retail shop that sells motorcycle spare parts that he has had for five years.         

To help expand his business, Muhammad has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase motorcycle spare parts for resale. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Muhammad hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for his children. In the future, Muhammad hopes to expand his business. Muhammad is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise program (SEP), which has helped his future prospects by improving his capital.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts for resale.

loans.name: María Julia

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia del banco comunal Corazones de Turi, vive por una comunidad  que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser el mirador de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, son personas muy amables y  conservan su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora María tiene 21 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 3 años de edad. Su esposo se dedica a la construcción es albañil, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad. 

Nuestra socia se dedica a la limpieza de casas actividad que la desempeña hace 2 años, trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su suegra, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos para iniciar con esta actividad.

Su meta es  tener un local de cabinas telefónicas.
texts.en:
Señora María is a member of the communal bank "Corazones de Turi" (Hearts of Turi).  She lives in a community that is a part of Turi Parrish.  The Parrish is known for being the lookout of the city.  The people there make their livings in commerce, raising livestock and in agriculture.  They are very friendly people who preserve their culture and traditions.

Señora María is 21 years old.  She is married, and together with her husband has one child, who is now 3 years old.  Her husband makes his living in construction; he is a bricklayer.  He owns the house they live in. 

Our member makes her living cleaning houses, which she has done for the last 2 years.  She works from Monday to Friday from 8am until 3pm.
 
This is Señora María's second loan with her communal bank, which her mother-in-law invited her to join.  She will invest the money from this loan in the purchase of pigs, to start up a business.

Señora María's goal is to one day have a shop with telephone booths.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Liz Janeth

texts.es: Liz (26 años) convive desde hace 10 años con Michel, con quien tiene 2 hijos: Ángela y David a los que quiere mucho y cuida en casa de su madrina, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Como joven emprendedora con principios y objetivos. Ella comenzó a trabajar como regidora en el gobierno de su localidad, donde recibe una pequeña dieta de S/. 700 nuevo soles; ahí comenzó a laborar para el bienestar y la justicia de su pueblo. También sigue tejiendo manualmente, chompas y gorras que vende a los intermediarios que comercializan los tejidos a diferentes ciudades del país. Ella se siente muy feliz con lo obtenido hasta el momento; porque recibe el apoyo de su esposo, quien trabaja en un programa educativo del estado; que se trata de alfabetizar a personas de la tercera edad, donde recibe un dinero extra. Ahora para el futuro de su familia desea seguir progresando y ahorrar lo necesario para emprender un negocio propio que le permita brindar una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Corazón de san pedro” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para conseguir sus objetivos. Además de prometer ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Liz de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 5 madejas de lana para realizar sus lindos tejidos.
texts.en:
Liz (26) has lived with her partner for 10 years and their 2 children, Ángela and David.  She loves them very much and takes care of them in her mother-in-law’s house in San Pedro de Cajas.  As a young entrepreneur with principles and goals she began to work as an alderwoman in the local government where she receives a small allowance of 700 new sols.  There she started to work for the welfare and justice of her town.

She also knits sweaters and hats by hand and sells them to wholesalers who in turn sell the knitwear in different cities in the country.  She feels very happy with where she has gotten up to now. Her husband supports her-he works in an educational program of the state where they teach literacy to the elderly, and he receives extra money.   Now for her family’s future she wants to continue progressing and saving what she needs to start her own business that will allow her to offer her family a higher standard of living.

She belongs to the communal bank “Corazón de San Pedro” and this is her first loan with MFP.  She is hoping for a small loan so that she can attain her objectives.  
She also promises to be punctual with the payments.   Liz will use the requested money to buy 5 skeins of wool so that she can make her beautiful knitwear.

loans.use: to buy 5 skeins of wool to make her beautiful knitwear.

loans.name: Jenny Paola

texts.es:
La Señora Jenny es socia del banco comunal Corazones de Turi, vive por una comunidad  que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser el mirador de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, son personas muy amables y conservan su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora. Jenny tiene 22 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijas, una de 2 años de edad y otra de 8 meses de edad. Su esposo es albañil, no tiene casa propia por lo que viven en casa de sus suegros con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.

Doña Jenny es empleada domestica actividad que la desempeña hace 3 años y trabaja solo los días que le llaman. En su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos y ganado.

Es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y chanchos para seguir en el negocio.
 
Su meta es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Jenny’s a member of the “Corazones de Turi” (Turi Hearts) communal bank.  She lives in a community that belongs to Turi Parish.  This parish is noted for being the city’s scenic overlook.  Its residents are merchants, raise livestock and farm.  They are very kind people who maintain their culture and traditions.

Jenny is 22 years old, married and has two daughters.  One is 2 years old and the other is 8 months old.  Her husband’s a bricklayer.  She does not have a house of her own; they live with her in-laws and they all share household expenses.

This is the second loan she’s had with the communal bank and she will use this new loan to buy chicks and piglets to continue in business.  Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy chicks and piglets.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Corazones de Turi, vive por una comunidad  que pertenece a la parroquia de Turi, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser el mirador de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, son personas muy amables y  conservan su cultura y tradiciones.

Doña Rosa tiene 42 años, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 24, 22, 20 y 18 años de edad, dos de sus hijos son casados e independiente y sus dos hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Rosa labora como empleada domestica desde los 11 años de edad, labora de lunes a viernes solo medio día. En su casa se dedica a la cría de pollos, cuyes y chanchos a los que vende los en las ferias de su comunidad.
 
Este es su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en su alimento.

Su meta es tener un local para dedicarse a hornear chanchos.
texts.en:
Rosa’s a member of the “Corazones de Turi” (Turi Hearts) communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Turi Parish.  This parish is noted for being the city’s scenic overlook.  Its residents are merchants, raise livestock and farm.  They are very kind people who maintain their culture and traditions.

Rosa is 42 years old.  She’s a widow and has four children who are 24, 22, 20 and 18 years of age.  Two of her children are married and are independent and two are still single, employed and help her out economically.  She owns the house she lives in.

Rosa has worked as a domestic employee since she was eleven years old.  She works Monday through Friday, half days.  At home, she raises chickens, pigs and guinea pigs that she sells in the local farmers markets.

This is her fourth loan with the communal bank and she will use it to buy chicks and feed for them.  Her goal is to have a place where she can work roasting pigs.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feed for them.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan con su credikiva compró muchas cosas y está satisfecho:   materiales para  la apicultura; Piquera, Bases, Cajas, Marcos,  láminas de cera, entre tapas y Techos, y le alcanzó para comprar mercancías para el negocio que tiene en la casa y atiende su esposa. Juan  dice a sus financiadores de Kiva que le apuesten mas al campo que tengan en cuenta a los clientes y especialmente cuando estén preparados para un aumento. En la actualidad con su nuevo credikiva comprará biológicos  y núcleos, porque tiene asegurada la comercialización de la miel de abejas. Así mismo invertirá en la compra de mercancías para que su cónyuge continúe extendiéndose en el mercado, pues tiene pedidos de ropa interior femenina e infantil. Con su credikiva También planea reparar los pisos de su vivienda y por eso se encuentra satisfecho de poder lograr cada día su bienestar y el de su familia. Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Juan ingrese al siguiente enlace: http://kiva.org/lend/204871
texts.en:
Juan used his Kiva loan to buy many things, and he is happy.  He bought materials for beekeeping; tap holes, bases, boxes, frames, comb foundations, and lids and tops.  He had enough to buy merchandise for the store that he has in his house, which his wife attends to.

Juan tells the Kiva lenders to support agriculture more and to keep the borrowers in mind, especially when they are ready for an increase.

He will now use his new Kiva loan to buy organic products and nuc hives because selling his honey is guaranteed.  He will also buy merchandise for his wife to continue expanding her market. She has orders for women’s and children’s underwear.  He also plans to use his Kiva loan to repair the floors in his house.  He is happy to be able to provide for his and his family’s well-being every day.

loans.use: buy organic products, nuc hives, children's clothing and underwear, and to make home repairs.

loans.name: Manuel Francisco

texts.es:
El Señor Manuel es socio del banco comunal Unión y Prosperidad, vive por la parroquia de Zhidmad, lugar que cuenta con hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes trabajos.

El Señor Manuel tiene 41 años, es casado y tiene 4 hijos de 12, 10, 8 y 6 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y tres  en una escuelita. Su esposa se dedica a la agricultura, la casa en que habitan es de su propiedad.
 
Nuestro socio tiene un aserradero, esta actividad la desempeña hace 15 años, trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde y de domingo a domingo.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir como parte de pago en la compra de una tienda ya que va a comenzar con este negocio.
 
Su meta es comprarse un vehículo para su negocio de la aserradora.
texts.en:
Manuel is a member of the “Unión y Prosperidad” (Unity and Prosperity) communal bank.  He lives in Zhidmad Parish, a place of beautiful scenery.  Its residents raise livestock and farm; many work at various jobs in the city.

Manuel is 41 years old, married and has four children who are 12, 10, 8 and 6 years of age.  His oldest son is in secondary school and the other three go to the local little elementary school.  His wife’s a farmer.  He owns the house they live in.

He owns a sawmill.  He’s been in this business 15 years.  He works from 6am until 6pm from Sunday through Sunday.

This is the first loan he’s had with the communal bank and he will use it as part of the payment to buy a store since he’s going to start this business.  His goal is to buy a vehicle for his sawmill business.

loans.use: to buy a store.

loans.name: María Flora

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Unión y Prosperidad, vive por la parroquia de Zhidmad, lugar que cuenta con hermosos paisajes, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes trabajos.

La Señora. María tiene 25 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 9, 7, 6 y 3 años de edad, sus tres primeros hijos están estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es aserrador, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

Doña María labora en una guardería, trabaja de lunes a viernes de 8 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde. En su casa se dedica a la cría de gallinas, cuyes y chanchos a los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue  invitada por una vecina, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de un bosque para el negocio de su esposo.
 
Su meta es  agrandar su negocio de venta de animales.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Unión y Prosperidad community bank. She lives in the Zhidmad parish, which has beautiful scenery. The people there raise animals and farm. Many of them work in the city at different jobs.

María is 25 years old, married and has four children from this marriage, aged 9, 7, 6 and 3 years old. Her three oldest children go to a local elementary school. Her husband works in a lumberyard and the house they live in is their property.

María works in a daycare. She works Monday through Friday from 8 in the morning until 4 in the afternoon. At home she raises chickens, guinea pigs and pigs which she sell sin the community.
