She will reinvest some of the proceeds realized from this business venture and use the rest to pay house rent, her children’s school fees and to provide medication for her family.

She prefers a GHAPE loan because of the low interest rate, because no collateral security is required, because the money is repaid in installments and also because of the training GHAPE gives its members.

The Grounded and Holistic Approach to People's Empowerment (GHAPE) is a non-profit NGO based in Bamenda, Cameroon. GHAPE works towards the empowerment of the poor and poverty alleviation through a highly multi-faceted approach. Every client is trained in business management, basic health, life skills, financial management, profits and losses, and family values. Clients are also required to contribute a small amount into a personal savings account; most clients save much more than the minimum requirement. GHAPE instills a sense of family and community within its clients and staff and has developed a strong bond of trust between the organization and its clients.

loans.use: Purchase material, thread, and groundnut

loans.name: Deysi Elizabeth

texts.es:
Deysi de 32 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Chepen que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona es comercial, agrícola y turismo.

Deysi desde hace 4 años brinda el servicio de cosmetóloga (corte de cabello, pintado de cabello, maquillaje, etc) cuenta con su clientela por el buen servicio que da, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar algunos materiales y herramientas necesarias para seguir brindando un buen servicio, al incrementarse su clientela podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar económicamente.  Deysi es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa que lo único que desea es que su negocio crezca para seguir apoyando a sus padres y poder brindarles algunos gustos.
texts.en:
Deysi is 32 years old, single and lives in her parents' house, which is connected to all public utilities. It is located in the built-up area of the district of Chepén in the department of La Libertad. The area is known for trade, farming and tourism.

Deysi has been a beautician for four years, providing haircuts, hair coloring, makeup, etc. She has a loyal clientele because of her good service. She spends her income on personal expenditures.

Deysi came to the microfinance institution Edpyme Alternativa and applied for a loan of 2500 new soles to buy materials and tools that she needs to continue to provide good service. Thanks to her larger clientele she will be able to pay off the loan and have an even more successful business. Deysi is a hard-working and dedicated woman whose only wish is to expand her business and provide financial support to her parents.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Santos Cristina

texts.es:
Santos D. 59 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia,  cuenta con servicios sólo D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Santos se dedica a la elaboración, venta D. chicha D. jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base D. maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú) y crianza D. aves D. corral, estas actividades los realiza desD. hace varios años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado D. generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas D. la chicha D. jora y cerveza en la zona donD. vive, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  

Teniendo la oportunidad D. crecer Santos a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. harina D. maíz para la elaboración D. chicha D. jora y alimento balanceado para sus aves, con la finalidad D. obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y prmitirá que su familia se siga superando.
texts.en:
Santos is 59 years old. She lives with her husband and children in their own house. The house only has electricity as a basic service. It is located in the rural district of TambogranD. in the department of Piura. The population of this entire area is dedicated to agriculture, livestock and crafts.

Santos manufactures and sells 'chicha D. jora' (a rich beverage maD. of corn and widely consumed in the north of Peru) and rears poultry. She has been doing both for several years, a custom passed down from generation to generation. Lately, the sales of 'chicha D. jora' and beer have increased in the area where she lives which has helped increase her revenues and improve the quality of life for her family.

With this opportunity to grow the business, Santos has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy more corn flour for the preparation of 'chicha D. jora' and nutritionally-balanced feed for her poultry, and in so doing to increase profits and the number of customers. The increased profits will be used to cover the loan and allow her family to continue bettering itself.

loans.use: to buy more corn flour for the preparation of chicha de jora (traditional corn-based beverage) and feed for her poultry

loans.name: Peace Group

texts.en:
Aminata is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Aminata was born in Magburaka town about 28 years ago. She is married and the couple has 3 children who are attending primary and secondary schools respectively. Aminata sells ready-to-wear-clothes, dishes, spoons, etc. 

With the help of this loan, Aminata and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Aminata will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to buy clothes, dishes and spoons to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes, dishes and spoons to add to her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts to repair a vehicle.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen de 33 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana de José Leonardo Ortiz que pertnence a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad comercial y transporte público.

Carmen conuna experiencia de 3 años viene preparando y vendiendo desayunos en el mercado Modelo, cuenta con su clientela que la mayor parte son los mismos trabajadores de la zona, con sus ingresos podrá solventar sus obligaciones de su hogar. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para compra de cocina industrial y utensilios necesarios para seguir realizando la misma actividad, satisfaciendo la necesidad de sus clientes.  Carmen es una mujer alegre que con esfuerzo y trabajo saca adelante a su familia y trata de brindarles otras oportunidades académicas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carmen is 33 years old. She lives with her family in her own house. The house has all the basic services and is located in the urban area of José Leonardo Ortiz, in the the province of Chiclayo. This area is dedicated to commercial activities and public transportation.

Carmen has 3 years experience in preparing and selling breakfast in the Modelo market. She depends on her customers who work locally and her revenues to cover her household expenses. 

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy an industrial cooker and kitchen utensils. which she needs to continue in the same business, satisfying the needs of her customers. Carmen is a cheerful woman who with effort and hard work supports her famliy and tries to provide her children with other educational opportunities.

loans.use: to buy an industrial cooker and kitchen utensils for her food stall.

loans.name: Katty Vilma

texts.es:
Katty Vilma tiene 18 años, Es soltera vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Katty Vilma  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos, semillas e insumos para la producción, con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades e incrementar la producción. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es superarse y trabajar mas. 

Se considera una persona emprendedora trabajadora, en el tiempo libre le gusta leer,escribir, bailar y compartir junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Katty Vilma is 18 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the canton of Ventanas located in Provincia de los Ríos.

The San Jose communal bank is located in the precinct of El Rosario, which is found in the Ventanas canton. This communal bank is focused on short cycle agriculture endeavors including the cultivation of corn, rice and beans. 

Katty makes a living in agriculture planting corn, rice and beans. She purchases her supplies at the Comercial Guzman store in Ventanas and she sells her produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting a loan to purchase manure, seeds and supplies to plant corn, rice and beans. This loan would help her financially to supply what she needs and expand her production. She faces challenges like pests and crop diseases. Her dream is to get ahead and work more.

She considers herself to be an entrepreneurial and hardworking person. In her free time she likes to read, write, dance and spend time with her family.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds and supplies.

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es:
Juana de 61 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Morrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

La actividad que desarrolla Juana es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz, producto que los pobladores consumen diariamente, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y Lambayeque, y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su casa. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así tener mejoras económicas.  Juana es una madre de familia que se preocupa por que su familia mejore y tenga algunas comodidades en su hogar.
texts.en:
Juana is 61 years old. She lives with her family in her own house. The house has no basic services and is located in the rural district of Morrope in the department of Lambayeque. The area is dedicated to agriculture, livestock and crafts.

Juana is a farmer. She owns her own farmland and plants corn, a staple crop. Once harvested, she sells her crop at different markets in Chiclayo and Lambayeque. She makes an income to cover her household expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy fertilizers to improve her farmland and produce, in order to sell it at a better price to the buyers and have a better income. Juana is a mother who wants to help her family improve and provide some household amenities

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve her farmland and produce.

loans.name: Maria Olinda

texts.es:
María de 23 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

María se dedica desde algunos años a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo pueden ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  María es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia salga adelante.
texts.en:
María is 23 years old. She lives with her husband and children in her own house. The house has electricty only and is located in the district of Mórrope in the department of Lambayeque. This area is dedicated to farming, livestock and tourism.

María has spent several years rearing and selling pigs. The pig pen is located at the back of her house. She feeds them a balanced diet and once they have reached their optimum size she puts them up for sale. The income earned pays for her household expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles (PEN) to buy more animals and their respective feed. Once fattened, she will sell them at the different markets in her area, with the goal of obtaining a better price and a higher income to improve their quality of life. María is a very hard-working and responsible person who only wants for her family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish for resale.

loans.name: Mary Isabel

texts.es:
Mary de 37 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Mary desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su familia.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar animales y alimento balanceado para los mismos, con los ingresos que adquiera por la venta puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Mary es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  mejore económicamente para tener otras comodidades.
texts.en:
Mary, 37, lives with her family in her own home. She lacks basic services and is located in a rural area of the district of Olmos in Lambayeque province. This area is characterized by its agriculture and livestock.

For several years Mary has worked raising and selling goats. Her corral is at the back of her house where the animals are happy and comfortable. She gives them feed and natural pastures so that they reach optimum growth and then sells them at different markets in the area. Thus she makes a very good profit and is able to pay the daily expenses of her family.

She has requested a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and feed. With the income she receives from the sales, she will cover her loan and improve her family’s quality of life. Mary is a hard working and very responsible person whose only wish is for her family to better itself and improve economically in order to have more amenities.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Nestor  de 44 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace algunos años Nestor se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Nestor es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en:
Nestor, age 44, lives with his wife and children in his own house, which has no basic services.  They live in the Tambogrande district in the Piura department.  This zone is known for its agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

For years Nestor has been selling basic needs items (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, and tuna, etc.) and drinks.  His business is located in his house for his comfort and safety.  With the income he gets from selling his products he tries to cover all of the expenses and improve his family’s standard of living.

In order to be able to expand his business he has requested a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternative so that he can buy more merchandise.  His only thought is for his business to grow and that he has more products to sell his customers.

Nestor is a responsible, devoted, and hard-working person.  He is concerned about giving his wife and children more amenities.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cosmetics and drugstore items to sell

loans.name: German Jose

texts.es: Germán comenzó su negocio hace tres años, cuando su esposa ya no pudo trabajar y se pensionó a través del seguro social, el señor labora una temporada de 6 meses de zafra en el ingenio san Antonio, y con sus ahorros y liquidación de pago puso un pequeño negocio donde vende refrescos, golosinas, gaseosas, jugos y otros productos  en su casa, luego se instaló a vender en un colegio de sus comunidad, con las utilidades logro comprar un triciclo taxi para transportar sus productos de sus ventas. Ahora solicita el crédito para la compra de llantas, asientos, aceites entre otros.
texts.en: Germán started his business three years ago when his wife was no longer able to work and went on social security.  He works during harvest time for six months at Ingenio San Antonio (a sugar estate in N.).  Using his savings and salary payment, he opened a small business at his house where he sells refreshments, sweets, sodas, juices and other items.  He then started to sell at a school in his community and with his profits, he was able to buy a tricycle taxi to transport his products to sell.  He is now requesting a loan to buy tires, seats, oils and other items.

loans.use: to buy tires, seats, oils, and other items.

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou habite  au Sénégal. Il est âgé  de 51 ans. Il évolue dans le commerce et la couture depuis plusieurs années. Il achète des tissus, confectionne des modèles  et les propose a la clientèle. Mamadou a choisi ses activités dans l’intention de se procurer des revenus et de se prendre en charge financièrement. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de nouveautés de tissus et de fournitures afin de satisfaire la demande de veille de fête  de sa clientèle. L’augmentation de ses bénéfices lui permet de régler les dépenses quotidiennes et de soutenir ses proches.
texts.en: Mamadou lives in Senegal. He is 51 years old and has been developing his trading and sewing business for several years. He buys fabric and makes up designs which he proposes to his customers. Mamadou choses these businesses with the aim of procuring some income and being able to take care of himself financially. He is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs to buy new fabric and supplies in order to be able to satisfy customer demand for the festivals. The increase in his profits will allow him to cover his running expenses and support his nearest and dearest.

loans.use: to buy fabric and supplies for making clothes

loans.name: Ermis Hernan

texts.es:
Ermis de 27 años de edad, es soltero, vive en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Ermis se dedica desde algunos años a la crianza y comercialización de aves de corral, su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar sus necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimento balanceado y una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga más clientes y así pueda tener mayores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Ermis es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que desea es que su negocio crezca para seguir ayudando a sus padres económicamente como hasta el momento.
texts.en:
Ermis, 27, is single and lives alone in a house that he owns.  The house has basic services: water and electricity.  Ermis lives in Morope, a district in Peru's "departamento" of Lambayeque.  Local people make their living from farming, raising livestock and tourism.

Ermis raises and sells poultry for a living.  He keeps the birds in a yard behind his house.  He feeds them a balanced diet that includes natural grains.  He sells the birds when they're ready for market and uses the income to support himself.  

Ermis is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new soles loan that he will use to buy the kind of feed he needs to raise birds that will fetch the best price.  The better the feed, the better the birds and the better the birds, the more he will get for them at market.  The extra income will provide him with a better quality of life.  Ermis is a resonsible, hard-working man.  He wants to grow his business so that he can continue to help support his parents.

loans.use: to buy feed for his poultry business.

loans.name: Eduardo Giovanny

texts.es:
Eduardo Giovanny tiene 21 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con la hija, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Eduardo Giovanny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas para la producción.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es superarse y trabajar mas para poder comprar un carro y una finca. 

Le gusta salir a pasear con la familia y Se considera una persona emprendedora y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Eduardo Giovanny is 21 years old, married, and lives with his wife and daughter in the Canton of Ventanas, located in the Province of Los Ríos.

The members of the San José Communal Bank are located in the El Rosario precinct belonging to the Canton of Ventanas. They work in short-cycle agriculture and grow corn, rice and beans.

Eduardo Giovanny works growing corn, rice and beans. He makes his purchases at the Guzmán shopping center in Ventanas and sells his products at the Ventanas wholesale market.

He is requesting the loan so that he can plant corn, rice and beans. He will purchase manure and seeds. The loan will help him financially to meet his needs. He faces difficulties such as pests and crop diseases. His dream is to get ahead and work more in order to be able to buy a car and a farm.

He likes to go out with his family and considers himself to be an enterprising and hardworking person.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice and beans with the purchase of manure and seeds.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Maximo de 64 años de edad, vive en con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicado en el distrito de La Victoria que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad comercio y transporte público.

Maximo se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza y comercialización de aves de corral (pavos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento y una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga más clientes y así pueda tener mayores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Maximo es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que desea es que su negocio crezca para seguir apoyando a su familia a salir adelante en la vida.
texts.en:
Maximo, 64, lives with his wife and children in a house that he owns.  The house has electricity, but no running water.  Maximo lives in La Victoria, a district in Peru's "departamento" of Chiclayo.  Local people operate commercial businesses and transportation services.

Maximo raises and sells poultry (turkeys) for a living.  He keeps the birds in a yard behind his house.  He feeds them a balanced diet that includes natural grains.  He sells the birds when they're ready for market and uses the income to support his family.  

Maximo is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new soles loan that he will use to buy more birds and the feed he needs to fatten them for market.  He plans to sell the birds locally, adding more customers as he grows and, in turn, increasing his income.  Maximo is a responsible, hard-working man and his only wish is to grow his business so that he can continue supporting his family and provide them with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more birds for his poultry business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate a chicken coop and to buy chicks

loans.name: Juan Inocente

texts.es:
Juan  de 38 años de edad, es soltero, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de San José que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera y turismo.

Desde hace unos años aproximadamente Juan se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (todo tipo de productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,otros) útiles de escritorio y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos personales.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio se amplie y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  con el dinero que gane para cubrirá su préstamo y sus obligaciones de su casa.  Juan es una persona dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Juan, 38, is single and lives in a house that he owns.  The house has basic services: water and electricity.  Juan lives in San Jose, a district in Peru's "departamento" of Chiclayo.  Local people make their living from fishing and tourism.

Juan has owned a general store for several years.  He sells all kinds of grocery products--milk, rice, cooking oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, etc.--along with office and school supplies and cold drinks.  He operates the business in a room of his house, an arrangement that he considers more secure.  He tries to support himself with the income from the business.

Juan is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new soles loan that he will use to buy merchandise for the business.  He wants to grow the business by expanding the range of products he can sell to his customers.  He will repay the loan with the extra money that he expects to make.  Juan is committed to working hard so that he can make a better life for himself.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his general store.

loans.name: Sonia Mariela

texts.es:
Sonia Mariela de Jesus tiene 21 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con el hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Sonia Mariela  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas para la producción.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es superar las ventas y la siebra, trabajar mas. 

En el tiempo libre le guta leer y escribir, se considera una persona emprendedora y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Sonia Mariela is 21 years old, married, and lives with her husband and son in the Canton of Ventanas, located in the Province of Los Ríos.

The members of the San José Communal Bank are located in the El Rosario precinct belonging to the Canton of Ventanas. They work in short-cycle agriculture and grow corn, rice and beans.

Sonia Mariela works growing corn, rice and beans. She makes her purchases at the Guzmán shopping center in Ventanas and sells her products at the Ventanas wholesale market.

She is requesting the loan so that she can plant corn, rice and beans. She will purchase manure and seeds. The loan will help her financially to meet her needs. She faces difficulties such as pests and crop diseases. Her dream is to improve sales and her crops, as well as to work more.

In her free time, she likes to read and write. She considers herself to be an enterprising and hardworking person.

loans.use: to buy manure and seeds.

loans.name: Mardonia

texts.es: Mardonia de 37 años, es muy laboriosa y atenta, ella vive en la casa de su mamá Alejandrina de 67 años, a quien cuida, también vive con 4 hermanas y dos sobrinas en la localidad de Huaracayo. Lleva 8 años dedicados a la venta de productos comestibles en un espacio disponible de la casa de sus padres, además siembra maíz, arveja, papa y cebada en sus terrenos propios, con la ayuda de peones que le ayudan en la faena diaria. Lo que más le gusta de su labor es atender a las personas que visitan su tienda desde tempranas horas de la mañana, pues ella es la primera en atender por su zona, por eso es la bodega más preferida por los vecinos. Como su trabajo es rentable y le permite cubrir sus gastos desea ampliar su tienda con más cantidad de productos alimenticios, que solicitan sus conocidos, sabe que le irá muy bien. Asimismo con la ayuda de una de sus hermanas planea instalar un centro comercial en un local alquilado en la ciudad de Tarma, que le permitirá recibir más utilidades. Este es el undécimo crédito que tiene con MFP y en todo este tiempo aprendió a valorar  el esfuerzo del trabajo arduo, además promete pagar puntualmente cada pago. Mardonia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de abono, mientras el resto de las utilidades las dispondrá en la compra de mercadería para su tienda.
texts.en: Mardonia is 37 years old and is very hardworking and considerate.  She lives with her 67-year-old mother, Alejandrina, and cares for her.  She also lives with four sisters and two nieces in Huaracayo.  She has worked selling food items for eight years in a spare area of her parent’s house.  She also grows corn, peas, potatoes and barley on land she owns and contracts laborers to help her with the daily tasks.  What she likes most about her job is tending to the people who visit her store early.  Her store is the first to open in the area, which is why her neighbors prefer it.  Since her work is profitable and allows her to cover her expenses, she wants to expand her store with more food products requested by her customers and knows that she will do well.  In addition, she also plans to set up a shopping area in a rented space in Tarma with the help of her sister so that she can have higher profits.  This is her eleventh loan with MFP and during this time, she has learned to value hard work.  She promises to make each payment on time.  Upon receiving the loan, Mardonia will invest the money requested in the purchase of a bag of pea seeds and several sacks of manure, while she will use the rest to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds and several sacks of manure.

loans.name: Santos Deivis

texts.es:
Santos de 30 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con todos  los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Pacasmayo que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Los pobladores de ésta zona se dedican a la pesca, agricultura y turismo.

Santos maneja su propia mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) desde hace 2 años aproximadamente, está actividad lo realiza en la misma zona donde vive, apesar de la competencia, él trata en lo posible desde muy temprano movilizar una buena cantidad de pasajeros a sus diferentes destinos, y así tenga mayor cantidad de ingresos para solventar sus gastos y necesidades personales.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1200 nuevos soles y su destino será para el mantenimiento y compra de repuestos para su mototaxi, con la finalidad de seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela al estar en buenas condiciones.  Santos es una persona con muchas ganas de trabajar y de salir adelante en la vida para seguir ayudando a sus padres.
texts.en:
Santos, 30, is single and lives with his parents.  The house has basic services.  Santos lives in Pacasmayo, an urban district in Peru's "departamento" of La Libertad.  Local people make their living from farming, fishing and tourism.

Santos owns a mototaxi business.  (A mototaxi is vehicle for transporting no more than 3 people over short distances.)  He has operated the business for approximately 2 years.  It's a local business and he fights off the fierce competition by starting early and moving as many passengers as he can to wherever they have to go.  He uses the income from the business to support himself.    

Santos is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 1200 new soles loan that he will use to buy spare parts for his mototaxi and to pay for routine vehicle maintenance.  He has to keep the mototaxi in good condition so that he can continue operating his business.  Santos likes running his own business and wants to grow it so that he can continue helping his parents.

loans.use: to pay for supplies and services that he needs for his taxi business.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.es:
Marieta tiene 49 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio D. agua y luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD., que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Marieta desD. hace varios años se dedica a la venta D. cosméticos por catálogo, sus productos los ofrece en su domicilio, pero también va D. casa en casa, cuenta con su clientela que le realiza pedido y ella les da facilidades D. pago, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá solventar sus necesidades diarias D. su hogar.  También cuenta con tierras D. cultivo donD. siembra limón y una vez que cosecha lo comercializa en el mercado y obtiene otro ingreso para su familia.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es D. 2000 nuevos soles para la compra D. mercadería para seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes y D. fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras, al aumentar su efectivo podrá pagar su préstamo y tener una mejor calidad D. vida.  Marieta es una mujer D. trabajo y dedicada con la finalidad D. darles mejores opciones D. estudios a sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en:
Marieta, 49, lives with her husband and children in a house that she owns. The house has basic services: water and electricity. Marieta lives in TambogranD., a district in Peru's "departamento" of Piura. Local people make their living from farming, raising livestock and making and selling traditional crafts.
 
Marieta has operated a cosmetics sales business for many years.  She orders merchandise from catalogs and sells what she buys at home or door-to-door.  Her customers place their orders with her and she makes it easy for them to pay.  The income from the business pays for the everyday things she needs for her family.  She also owns land where she grows lemons.  She harvests the lemons, sells them and uses the income to support her family.
 
Marieta is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new soles loan, partly to stock her cosmetics sales business and partly to buy fertilizer for her farming business.  She expects the investment to increase her earnings so that she can both repay the loan and proviD. her family with a better quality of life.  Marieta is committed to growing her business and helping her children get the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her cosmetics sales business and fertilizer for her farming business.

loans.name: Carlos Misael

texts.es: Carlos tiene 31 años, comenzó hace dos años como trabajador de un comerciante de la ciudad, luego paso a supervisor de ventas pero con el paso del tiempo Carlos aprendió lo más necesario de este negocio para empezar el propio. Los deseos de superación han logrado que Carlos llegue a dedicarse a la venta de mercadería en general. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de telas, bolsos, cosméticos, calzado y tratamientos.
texts.en: Carlos is 31 years old and he started to work as a merchant in the city two years ago.  He then went on to be a sales supervisor but over time, Carlos learned the most important parts of this job in order to start his own business.  His desire to get ahead led Carlos to sell general merchandise.  The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of fabrics, bags, cosmetics, shoes and treatments.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, bags, cosmetics, shoes and treatments.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro  de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Desde hace algunos años Alejandro se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Alejandro es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 43 years old and he lives with his wife and children in his own house (which only has electricity), in the Cayaltí district which is part of the department of Lambayeque. This area is famous for farming, ranching and tourism.

For the past few years Alejandro has been selling basic, everyday goods (milk, rice, oil, toilet paper, tuna, etc) and drinks. For his convenience, his business is run from his home. He tries to cover all his expenses and improve his family's standard of living with the profits earned from the sale of his goods.

In order to develop his business, he has requested a loan of 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise, with the single objective of growing his business and having a better range of products to offer his customers. Alejandro is a responsible, dedicated and hard-working person who wants to provide his wife and children with more advantages in life.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise to develop his business

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, de 61 años, es una mujer responsable y muy amorosa. Hace algún tiempo se separó de su esposo con el que tiene un hijo; que junto a su nieta viven en su casa propia ubicada en Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Todas las mañanas desde las primeras horas del día, los pobladores de su localidad salen a comprar los alimentos del día en la bodega que acondicionó en su casa, desde hace algunos años. Comenta que le va muy bien en su negocio, ya que es la bodega más surtida de su localidad. Pero la actividad que más disfruta Teodora, es la agricultura, sus principales sembríos constan de café y plátanos, ya tiene 41 años dedicándose a ello y según afirma es una buena terapia, “descanso en la tranquilidad del campo”, afirma. Además de asociarse en la cooperativa denominada “Cerezo”, donde compran sus granos y la capacitan para mejorar la calidad de sus cultivos. Sus planes son adquirir sus propios terrenos agrícolas, para poder minimizar los gastos de alquiler. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestarios de la unión palomar”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura saldrá adelante, gracias al apoyo financiero brindado. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Teodora de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
Teodora, age 61, is a very responsible and a very loving woman.  She separated from her husband some time ago.  They have a son, who together with her granddaughter, lives with her in her own house in Unión Palomar (central Peruvian jungle).  

Starting very early every morning the local inhabitants go to buy their daily food in the grocery store that she established in her house several years ago.  She says that the business is going very well for her.  It is the best stocked grocery store in her area.

However, the activity that Teodora most enjoys in farming.  Her main crops are coffee and bananas.  She has been doing this for 41 years.  According to her it is good therapy, “I rest in the peacefulness of the field,” she says.

Also, she is a member of the “Cerezo” cooperative where she buys grains and receives trainings in order to improve the quality of her crops.

Her plan is to get her own farm land in order to be able to minimize the rental expenses.

She belongs to the “Prestarios de la Unión Palomar” Communal Bank.  This is her second loan with MFP, where she is sure to get ahead thanks to the financial support provided.  She pledges to make her payments punctually.  Upon receiving your support, Teodora will use the requested money to buy basic needs items to stock her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio de 55 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural el distrito de Pomahuaca que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agricultura,  ganadería y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Florencio es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra cacao y café, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y Cajamarca, así puede obtener mayores ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su hogar. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto y mantenimiento de su finca, con la finalidad de ofertar su producto a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así mejorar económicamente.  Florencio es un padre que se preocupa por que su familia mejore y que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Florencio, 55 years old, lives with his family in his own house, which does not have basic services. It is located in a rural area of the Pomahuaca district in the department of Cajamarca. This area is characterized by agricultural activity, cattle ranching, and tourism.

Florencio works in agriculture. He has his own farmland where he grows cacao and coffee. Once he harvests his crops, he offers them at various markets in Chiclayo and Cajamarca so that he can earn more to cover his household expenses.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to purchase fertilizers to improve his lands and his produce, and for the maintenance of his farm. Then he can offer his produce to merchants at a better price and in this way improve economically. Florencio is a father who is concerned that his family improve and that his children have other opportunities in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers to improve his lands and maintain his farm

loans.name: Verónica Del Rocío

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 38 años vive en Ibarra junto a sus hijos que tienen 1 y 7 años, se describe como una persona responsable y trabajadora.

Trabaja en la comercialización de perfumes y cosméticos durante un año. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito a FODEMI, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de cosméticos y perfumes para abastecer su negocio, este negocio si crece le ayudaría para poderles dar el estudio a sus hijos.

Su sueño es poder ponerse una tienda propia.
texts.en:
Veronica, 38, lives in Ibarra with her two children, 1- and 7-years old.  She is a responsible, hard-working woman.  

She has made a living buying and selling perfumes and cosmetics for a year.  This is her first FODEMI loan and she will use it to stock her business with cosmetics and perfumes.  If this business grows, it will help her provide her children with an education.  

Her greates wish is to open her own shop.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business.

loans.name: Roxana De Lourdes

texts.es:
Roxana  de 46 años de edad, es soltera, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de San José que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera y turismo.

Desde hace unos años aproximadamente Roxana se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (todo tipo de productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,otros) útiles de escritorio y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos personales.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería, con el único ideal de que su negocio se amplie y tenga más productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes;  con el dinero que gane cubrirá su préstamo y sus obligaciones diarias.  Roxana es una persona dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por tener más comodidades en su casa y mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Roxana is 46, single, and lives in her own house, which has all the basic services. It's located in the urban area of San José district, which is part of Chiclayo province. This area is known for fishing and tourism. 

Roxana has been selling groceries for several years. She carries all types of daily-use products such as: milk, rice, cooking oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs, stationery, drinks, and other things. She has set up her store in her house for security. With her profits from selling her products, she tries to cover all her personal expenses. 

In order to carry on her business, she is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy more merchandise. Her only wish is for her business to grow, and to have more products to offer her customers.

With the money she earns she will pay off her loan, and meet her daily obligations. Roxana is a dedicated and hard-working individual, who cares about having more home comforts, and being in a better financial position.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for stocking her store.

loans.name: Alex Alfonso

texts.es:
Alex Alfonso tiene 20 años, Es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Alex Alfonso se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas para la producción.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando y ayudar a los padres.

Le gusta hacer deporte y trabajar en el campo.
texts.en:
Alex Alfonso, 20, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in Los Rios province.

The V.R.C. SAN JOSE community bank is located near EL ROSARIO in the canton of Ventanas.  The group funds agricultural projects and its members grow maize, rice and beans.

Alex Alfonso grows maize, rice and beans.  He buys supplies in Comercial Guzman in Ventanas and sells his crop at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is applying for a loan to fund his next plantings of maize, rice and beans.  He will buy the seeds and manure that he needs for the crops.  By supporting this loan, you will be helping him buy the supplies he needs.  His biggest challenge are plant diseases and insects that can destroy his crop.  His greatest wish is to buy a farm so that he can continue farming and helping his parents.

He likes sports and working on the land.

loans.use: to buy supplies for farming business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana de 34 años de edad, vive en con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Juana se dedica desde hace 4 años a la crianza y comercialización de aves de corral (gallinas, pavos y patos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puede ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar sus necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento y una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga más clientes y así pueda tener mayores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Juana es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que desea es que su negocio crezca para seguir ayudando a su familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Juana, 34, lives with her husband and children in her own house which has electricity and water and is located in Mórrope District that belongs to Lambayeque Department.  It’s a zone characterized by farming, cattle raising and tourism.

Juana has been raising barnyard fowl (chickens, turkeys and ducks) to sell for the last four years.  Her corral is in her back yard.  She feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grains.  When they reach optimum growth she can sell them to her customers and use income obtained to meet her personal expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy more animals and their respective feed and once they are fattened up she will sell them at the various markets in her area hoping to attract more customers to increase her income and have a better quality of life.  Juana is a responsible, hardworking person whose only wish is that her business grows to continue helping her family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy more animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food for her restaurant business

loans.name: Ericka

texts.es:
Erika es una madre de familia de 23 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia,  no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de la Unión que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

Erika se dedica a la elaboración, venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú) y crianza de aves de corral, estas actividades los realiza desde hace varios años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación. Últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de la chicha de jora en la zona donde vive, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Erika a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de harina de maíz para la elaboración de chicha de jora y más animales, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Erika, 23, is a mother living with her husband and children in her own house which does not have any of the basic utilities and is located in the rural part of La Unión District belonging to Piura Department.  In this entire zone residents farm, raise livestock, make crafts or are in tourism.

Erika makes “chicha de jora” (beverage made from corn and very much consumed in northern Perú) to sell and raises barnyard fowl.  She’s been carrying out these activities for several years since it’s a custom passed down from generation to generation.  Lately, chicha de jora sales have increased in the zone where she lives which has been favorable for her to increase income and improve her family’s quality of life.

With the opportunity for growth this represents, Erika has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy larger amounts of corn flour to make the chicha de jora and to buy more animals aiming for higher profits and more customers in order to repay the loan and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more corn flour to make chicha de jora and to buy barnyard fowl.

loans.name: Alexandra Maria

texts.es:
Alexandra Maria tiene 40 años, Es soltera vive con la madre no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Alexandra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas para la producción.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es ingrametar la produccion comprarndo mas terreno para seguir cultivando.

Le gusta leer y escuchar muisica.
texts.en:
Alexandra Maria is 40 years old. She is single with no children and lives with her mother in the Cantón Ventanas division of Los Ríos, Ecuador.  

The members of the V.R.C. SAN JOSE are located in the EL ROSARIO area of Cantón Ventanas, which is dedicated to planting short-cycle maize, rice and beans. 

Alexandra plants corn and beans.  She buys her products in the Guzman commercial area in Cantón Ventanas and sells them in the wholesale market.

She is requesting a loan to plant corn and beans and to buy fertilizers and seeds for production. The loan would help her to meet her financial needs in spite of facing challenges such as pests and crop diseases.  Her dream is to increase production by purchasing more land for cultivation.

She enjoys reading and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Jeff

texts.es: Jeff, de 31 años, es un joven soltero y trabajador. Su familia lo conforman sus padres y su hermana, con quienes viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como hombre joven y lleno de ambiciones, Jeff se dedicaba a  vender electrodomésticos en diferentes ciudades del país; con el tiempo sus deseos eran mayores, quería tener algo propio. Es entonces que comenzó a dedicarse a la agricultura. Sus principales cultivos constan de café, los cuales siembra en sus 2 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, ya tiene 6 años dedicándose a ello. Lo que más le gusta, es poder ayudar a sus padres a mejorar sus granos, ya que le heredaron parte de sus cultivos. “El secreto para obtener un buen grano, es dedicar mayor tiempo en el cuidado de las plantaciones”, afirma, por ello sus planes para el futuro son, sembrar otras variedades de café. Su experiencia en las ventas y las ganas de salir adelante le ayudarán a lograr su objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de unión palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP,  donde asegura podrá salir adelante gracias a su banco comunal y a todos ustedes, que hacen posible el pequeño préstamo. Jeff instalará 5 mil plantitas de café; por ello de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en la contrata de peones para que le ayuden en el poseo (hoyos en la tierra para plantar), de esa manera obtendrá su hectárea de terreno cultivable listo para producir.
texts.en: Jeff, 31, is a young man who is single and hard-working. His family is comprised of his parents and his sister, with whom he lives in their own house in the community of Unión Palomar (in the central Peruvian jungle). As a young man full of ambitions, Jeff used to sell small home appliances in different cities around the country. Over time, though, he wanted more than that. He wanted something that was his own. That is when he started working in agriculture. Jeff's principal crop is coffee, which he plants on his two hectares of farmland. He has already been doing this work for six years. The thing he likes most is that he is able to help his parents to improve their coffee beans too, since he inherited part of their crops. "The secret to obtaining a good coffee bean is to dedicate more time to caring for your plantation," he says. His plan for the future is to plant other varieties of coffee. His sales experience and his desire to get ahead will help him to achieve his objectives. He belongs to the "Prestatarios de Unión Palomar" ["Borrowers of Unión Palomar"] communal bank and this is his second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. He is sure that he will be able to get ahead thanks to his communal bank and all of you, who are making this small loan possible for him. Jeff will plant five thousand coffee seedlings. In order to do so, he will use the requested money to hire workers to help him with el poseo (making holes in the ground to plant the seedlings). This way, he will be able to get his land ready to produce.

loans.use: to hire workers to prepare his fields for planting coffee

loans.name: Margoth Ines

texts.es:
Margoth Ines tiene 23 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con un hijo de 3 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Margoth se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas para la producción.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es culminar el ciclo de cultivo y que salga bien los productos.

Le gusta pasar con la familia y ser una persona trabajadora.
texts.en:
Margoth Ines is 23 years old, married, and lives with her husband and three-year-old son in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the San Jose Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of El Rosario, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and beans.

Margoth is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. She buys her supplies at the Guzman Commercial Center in Ventanas and sells her products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting a loan for planting corn, rice, and beans. Margoth plans to buy composts and seeds. With the financial assistance, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include pests and diseases that could impact her crops. Her dream is finish the crop season with a good harvest.

Margoth enjoys spending time with her family and being a hardworking individual.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Maritza Bernarda

texts.es: Maritza Bernarda tiene 47 años.  Ella posee una pulpería, es muy reconocida en el lugar pues las personas siempre encuentran lo que necesitan además tiene muy buenas referencias es una mujer trabajadora, honesta y muy amable siempre recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa en el rostro. Maritza tiene muchas metas y quiere cumplirlos por eso trabaja con mucha dedicación el éxito. Su crédito será para la compra granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes y enlatados así podrá mantener el negocio y lograra darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Maritza Bernarda is 47 years old and manages a general store. She is well-known in the area because her customers can always find what they need. Maritza has very good references and is a hardworking, honest, and friendly woman who always welcomes her customers with a smile on her face. She has many goals and wants to accomplish them successfully through hard work and dedication.

Her loan will be used to buy basic grains, candy, soft drinks, bread, detergents, and canned goods so that she can maintain her business and provide her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, soft drinks, bread, detergents, and canned goods.

loans.name: Humberto Jesús

texts.es: Humberto, de 19 años, es un joven soltero y trabajador, que vive con su mamá María y su papá Jesús. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas.  Es un hijo ejemplar, ya que apoya constantemente a sus padres. El trabajo al que se dedica Humberto, es la venta de tapices, gorras y compones (abrigos largos), ya tiene 3 años, dedicándose a la venta al por mayor de estos tejidos, los que constantemente vende en el país de Ecuador, a donde viaja una ves al mes, ahí vende los lindos tejidos a los pobladores de su localidad, que gracias a la asesoría que recibe de su padre Jesús, él que le brinda las facilidades, “quiero hacer de mi hijo, un hombre independiente”, afirma. Pero como buen hijo, Humberto también ayuda a su mamá, en la tienda de venta de lanas que abrió, donde quiere no solo vender lana natural, también, lana sintética de diferentes colores y diseños, los que últimamente son más solicitados y generan buen ingreso. “Quiero adquirir toda la experiencia de mis padres, para independizarme”, concluye. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Corazón de san pedro” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde está seguro de salir adelante con el apoyo su banco comunal, además de agradecer la oportunidad de éxito que le brindan.Humberto de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de lanas de diferentes colores que le servirán  para comenzar a tejer, asimismo comprará más tapices para comercializarlos.
texts.en:
Humberto, age 19, is a single young man and a hard worker. He lives with his mother María and his father Jesús. This family lives in their own home in the town of San Pedro de Cajas. Humberto is an exemplary son who constantly helps his parents. His work involves selling tapestries, caps, and overcoats and he has been doing this for three years. Humberto sells these woven items wholesale on a constant basis. He travels to Ecuador once a month to sell these beautiful woven articles, but he also sells them to the villagers in his town. His father Jesús offers him advice and the facilities in which he can work. “I want my son to become an independent man”, says his father. Being a good son, Humberto also helps his mother with the store she just opened. She sells natural and synthetic wool of different colors and designs. These products have lately generated many orders and good income. “I want to have all the experiences that my parents had and to become independent”, says Humberto.

He is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazón de San Pedro” (Heart of San Pedro) and this is his third loan with MFP. Humberto is confident that he can succeed with the help of his Communal Bank. He is grateful for the opportunity for success that has been given to him. With this assistance, Humberto will invest the money he requested in the purchase of wool in different colors to begin weaving more tapestries. He will also buy additional tapestries that he can sell.

loans.use: to buy wool in different colors and additional tapestries that he can sell.

loans.name: Oscar Manuel

texts.es:
Oscar Manuel tiene 41 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los tres hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Oscar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es que haya cumplido la meta de que la siembra le haya salido bien para tener mas utilidad. 

Le gusta ser una persona emprendedora y trabajar para dar un buen futuro a los hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar Manuel is 41 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the San Jose Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of El Rosario, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and beans.

Oscar is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. He buys his supplies at the Guzman Commercial Center in Ventanas and sells his products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan for planting corn, rice, and beans. Oscar plans to buy composts and seeds. With the financial assistance, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include pests and diseases that could impact his crops. His dream is to successfully finish his planting so that he can earn more profit.

Oscar enjoys being an enterprising individual and working to provide his children a good future.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Rosa Elena tiene 24 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los dos hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Rosa Elena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es superar la mala economia familiar.

Le gusta cocinar para la familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Elena is 24 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the San Jose Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of El Rosario, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and beans.

Rosa Elena is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. She buys her supplies at the Guzman Commercial Center in Ventanas and sells her products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting a loan for planting corn, rice, and beans. Rosa Elena plans to buy composts and seeds. With the financial assistance, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include pests and diseases that could impact her crops. Her dream is to overcome her family’s bad financial situation.

Rosa Elena enjoys cooking for her family.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria Esther tiene 29 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los dos hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE, se encuentra ubicada recinto EL ROSARIO, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol.

Maria Esther se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol . Compra sus productos en Comercial Guzman en Ventanas y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y frejol, para la compra de abonos y semillas .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades de los cultivos. Su sueño es tener dinero para educar a los hios.

Le gusta leer y escribir.
texts.en:
Maria Esther is 29 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the San Jose Communal Bank meet in the neighborhood of El Rosario, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and beans.

Maria Esther is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and beans. She buys her supplies at the Guzman Commercial Center in Ventanas and sells her products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting a loan for planting corn, rice, and beans. Maria Esther plans to buy composts and seeds. With the financial assistance, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include pests and diseases that could impact her crops. Her dream is to have money for her children’s education.

Maria Esther enjoys reading and writing.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 48 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has four children, three of whom are currently in school. For the past 10 years, Agnes has run a poultry farm. She is a member of BRAC’s, small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.
 	
Agnes is requesting a 2,500,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to purchase chickens to sell. With the help of her loan, Agnes hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for her family. In the future, Agnes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 58 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is single and has four children, two of whom are currently in school. For the past 10 years, Aida has run a business selling clothes. She is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her capital.
	
Aida is requesting a 2,000,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to purchase clothes to resell. With the help of her loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for her family. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Milly

texts.en:
Milly is 50 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has five children, four of whom are currently in school. For the past 10 years, Milly has run a business selling clothes. She is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.

Milly is requesting a 2,500,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to purchase clothes to resell. With the help of her loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for her family. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 39 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is single and has five children, four of whom are currently in school. For the past 10 years, Betty has run a business selling clothes. She is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.

Betty is requesting a 2,000,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to expand her business by purchasing clothes to sell. With the help of her loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. In the future, Betty hopes to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
Kuña Guapa se denomina el comité formado por 17 mujeres de la ciudad de Luque. El grupo se inicio hace casi cinco años con el programa comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya, actualmente se encuentra en el ciclo Nº 17.
Las miembros se definen como mujeres trabajadoras y con mucho deseo de crecimiento. Uno de los principales objetivos del grupo es la obtención de mayores ingresos económicos para cada una de las miembros.
La señora Nidia es la presidenta del grupo, ella esta casada con el señor Felix, el cual se dedica en la construcción, ellos tienen dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de tortas y confites para todo tipo de eventos. Ella por medio de esto puede obtener buenos ingresos con lo que logra ayudar en los gastos de la casa. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener una confitería donde puedo exhibir sus productos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la elaboración de sus tortas y confites, como ser huevo, leche, harina, azúcar y demás.
texts.en:
“Kuña Guapa” is the name of this committee that consists of 17 women from the city of Luque. The group joined the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program offered by Fundación Paraguaya almost five years ago. They are currently in their 17th loan cycle. The members define themselves as hardworking women who have tremendous desire to grow. One of their main objectives as a group is to obtain better financial income for each member.

Sra. Nidia is the president of the group. She is married to Sr. Felix, who works in construction, and they have two children. Nidia prepares cakes and candies for all types of events. Through her work, she is able to generate a good income to help with the household expenses. One of her dreams is to open a candy shop where she can display her products. She is requesting a loan to buy the necessary ingredients for making her cakes and candies such as eggs, milk, flour, sugar, and other items.

loans.use: to buy eggs, milk, flour, sugar, and other items for making cakes and candies.

loans.name: Resty

texts.en:
Resty is 36 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe in the Kampala east region of Uganda.  She is married and has 2 children.  All of her children are currently in school.  Resty has a business of selling charcoal, which she has had for 6 years.    
	
To help expand her business, Resty has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase charcoal for resale.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Resty hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for her family.  In the future, Resty hopes to expand her business.  Resty is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is 45 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe, in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is widowed and has three children, all of whom are currently in school. For the past eight years, Aisha has run a poultry farm. She is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.  

Aisha is requesting a 2,500,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to expand her business and purchase chickens and chicken feed. With the help of her loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees. In the future, Aisha hopes to continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and chicken feed

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith is 38 years old and lives in the town of Kalerwe, in the Kampala east region of Uganda. She is married and has three children, all of whom are currently in school. For the past ten years, Edith has run a business selling charcoal. She is a member of BRAC’s small enterprise (SEP) program, which has helped her prospects for the future by improving her business.

Edith is requesting a 1,500,000 UGX loan from BRAC Uganda to purchase charcoal to resell. With the help of her loan, she hopes to generate greater profits and buy food for her family. In the future, Edith hopes to buy a forest of her own so that she can supply her own charcoal.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell

loans.name: La Fuente De Bendicion 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Reina is one of our businesswomen. She works selling seafood in her community, which is a rural area surrounded by forests and mountains.
